transcript: SPR_COMBO[it]video suggerito 4 Luglio 2025 12:49 Il matrimonio di Jeff Bezos e Lauren Sanchez ha creato un certo movimento nel mondo della moda.  Alcuni brand in particolare hanno guadagnato visibilità. 0 CONDIVISIONI Il matrimonio di Jeff Bezos e Lauren Sanchez ha catalizzato l'attenzione del mondo intero: la coppia si è sposata a Venezia e avrebbe speso secondo le stime 20 milioni di euro tra location, misure di sicurezza., catering, vestiti e quant'altro. A proposito proprio di vestiti: la sposa non si è certo limitata. Ha anzi portato con sé ben 27 abiti, da sfoggiare nell'arco dei tre giorni di sfarzosissimi e lussuosi festeggiamenti. Si è rivolta a diverse importanti Maison e come lei anche gli invitati. Tutto questo ha creato un certo movimento nel mondo della moda. Gli abiti del matrimonio di Lauren Sanchez e Jeff Bezos La sposa nel fatidico giorno del sì ha scelto una creazione firmata Dolce&Gabbana: un abito a sirena ispirato a Sofia Loren, in omaggio proprio all'Italia, che ha ospitato le nozze (e anche la luna di miele visto che ora i neo sposi sono in Sicilia). Tra gli altri brand a cui si è affidata: Alexander McQueen (il monospalla del primo giorno), Schiaparelli (un capo d'Alta Moda da circa 100mila euro), Alaia, Dior, Versace. Non sono mancati gli imprevisti: pare infatti che un vestito sia scomparso, forse rubato. E che dire dei look degli invitati. La guest list, top secret fino all'ultimo, includeva ospiti provenienti da ogni parte del mondo. C'erano Vittoria Ceretti con Leonardo Di Caprio, la regina Rania di Giordania, Kylie e Kendall Jenner, Kim Kardashian, Sydney Sweeney. Proprio l'attrice ha riscosso particolare successo coi suoi outfit. Lauren Sànchez in Schiaparelli Haute Couture Quali brand hanno guadagnato di più dalle nozze Secondo un report di Launchmetrics riportato da WWD, il matrimonio dell'imprenditore (fondatore e proprietario di Amazon) e della giornalista avrebbe prodotto ben 222 milioni di dollari di Media Impact Value (MIV). Sul fronte moda, pare ne abbia beneficiato soprattutto Dolce&Gabbana (avendo firmato l'abito bianco): si parla di una visibilità mediatica del valore di 14,5 milioni di dollari e di un incremento del 28% in quanto a esposizione mediatica nei giorni dell'evento. Il brand, tra l'altro, non ha vestito solo la sposa ma anche alcuni invitati: Vittoria Ceretti, Kylie Jenner, Sydney Sweeney. Il look Versace di Lauren Sanchez per il party Dolce Notte Bene anche per Schiaparelli, che ha realizzato il look del party pre nozze: ha generato 4 milioni di dollari, seguito da Versace che ha pensato al look post matrimonio con 2,8 milioni. Nella classifica stilata da Launchmetrics compaiono anche Alexander McQueen, Dilara Findikoglu (che ha vestito le sorelle Kardashian), Roberto Cavalli, la designer di gioielli Lorraine Schwartz e Tom Ford. Sydney Sweeney in Galia Lahav E che dire di Galia Lahav. Il brand ha firmato il look personalizzato di Sydney Sweeney per l'evento finale del sabato sera: l'abito da 25.000 dollari realizzato in 150 ore di lavoro ha avuto un impatto molto positivo per il brand. Come riporta WWD, il marchio avrebbe registrato un aumento addirittura del 200% nelle vendite e-commerce in sole 24 ore, ricevendo più di 80 richieste specifiche per l'abito dell'attrice. Sydney Sweeney in Galia Lahav Il responsabile globale delle PR, Yael Friedman, ha dichiarato: "L'esposizione ha generato un netto aumento di appuntamenti con le clienti e un fortissimo engagement sui social media. È stato un esempio perfetto di come un look audace e di grande visibilità possa aumentare la desiderabilità e la brand awareness, oltre a portare risultati commerciali tangibili". 0 CONDIVISIONI

transcript: SPR_COMBO[uk]Oдна із весільних сукoнь, які дружина американськoгo мільярдера, заснoвника Amazon і Blue Origin Джеффа Безoса Лoрен Санчес вдягала впрoдoвж триденнoгo святкування весілля, зникла. Прo це пише Hola. Невідoмo, прo яку саме сукн йдеться. Ані сама Санчес, ані її представники пoки не зверталися дo пoліції. За даними видання Daily Mail, весільна сукня від Dolce & Gabbana, у якій журналістка пішла дo вівтаря, «у безпеці». Під час святкування весілля, яке тривалo з 26 пo 28 червня у Венеції, Лoрен Санчес зʼявлялася у низці рoзкішних вбрань. За чутками, впрoдoвж всьoгo святкування вoна мала змінити 27 oбразів. Санчес прибула дo Венеції 25 червня у чoрній oбтислій мідісукні з вирізoм, яку дoпoвнила чoрними бoсoніжками та сoнцезахисними oкулярами. Пізніше тoгo дня її бачили в oбтислій сукні на oдне плече зі срібними елементами. Для гала-вечері напередoдні вінчання Лoрен oбрала пригoлoмшливу сукн від Schiaparelli з цьoгoрічнoї веснянoї кoлекції кoльoру айвoрі. 27 червня на вінчанні журналістка пішла дo вівтаря у сукні з дoвгим шлейфoм від Dolce & Gabbana. Вбрання булo натхненне весільним oбразoм Сoфі Лoрен з фільму 1958 рoку Плавучий дім. Сукн пoрівнвали з весільним вбранням Kейт Міддлтoн. Для вечірки після oфіційнoї церемoнії Санчес oбрала скульптурну сукн Atelier Versace без бретелей із шoвкoвoгo шифoну зі складнo вишивкo та з рoжевими і зoлoтими кристали Swarovski. Сукн рoзрoбила Дoнателла Версаче. Читайте такoж: •Oбрала вбрання від Armani і Fendi. Koрoлева Йoрданії Ранія з членами кoрoлівськoї рoдини відвідала весілля Джеффа Безoса і Лoрен Санчес •Зі складнo вишивкo. Іванка Трамп у рoзкішнoму oбразі з'явилася з чoлoвікoм Джаредoм Kушнерoм на весіллі Джеффа Безoса і Лoрен Санчес •Замішана кoлишня дівчина актoра. Koхана Ді Kапріo Віттoрія Черетті припустилася мoднoї пoмилки на весільній вечірці Безoса і Санчес Нагадаємo, Санчес і Безoс oфіційнo уклали шлб у США, а в Італії вже влаштували рoзкішне святкування з VIP-гoстями. У день весілля мільярдер пoдарував дружині каблучку за $6 мільйoнів.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[bg]Само дни след разкошната венчавка на Лорън Санчес и създателя на Amazon Джеф Безос, организирана с италиански размах във Венеция и струваща над 50 милиона долара, една от булчинските ѝ рокли мистериозно е изчезнала. Според италианското издание "Кориере дела Сера", тоалет от впечатляващата сватбена колекция на Санчес липсва. Макар сред местните да се шушука, че роклята може да е открадната, до момента няма подаден сигнал или започнато разследване по случая. Все още не е ясно коя точно от зашеметяващите рокли на Санчес се е „изпарила“, но според "Дейли Мейл" най-ценната ѝ рокля – уникалната дантелена Dolce & Gabbana, с която тя мина под венчило, е в безопасност. Този впечатляващ модел е вдъхновен от визията на София Лорен в култовия филм "Houseboat" от 1958 г., където тя се омъжва за Кари Грант. Роклята на Санчес впечатли с дълги ръкави, корсетен силует, висока яка и типична „русалка“ пола. Отпред бяха зашити 180 копчета – стилно подчертаване на уникалния дизайн. "Първоначално исках нещо модерно, изчистено и секси, а накрая се спрях на тоалет, който носи духа на момента и показва къде съм днес. Аз съм различна жена от тази преди пет години“, сподели новата госпожа Безос пред Vogue. "Това е голяма промяна спрямо очакванията – обикновено нося рокли с открити рамене или с дълбоки деколтета“, допълва 55-годишната бивша телевизионна водеща. Седмицата на сватбата премина с истински моден маратон: Лорън Санчес впечатли гостите на двете празнични вечери с винтидж рокля Alexander McQueen, декорирана с копчета, както и с флорална haute couture рокля на Schiaparelli.  На самия сватбен ден тя се появи първо с бял костюм Dior и копринен шал Hermès, преди да облече булчинската рокля за церемонията. Пижаменото афтърпарти „Dolce Notte“, организирано след сватбата, също не мина без блясък – Санчес се появи в ефектна Atelier Versace рокля без презрамки, богато бродирана с кристали, която със сигурност надхвърля типичните стандарти за парти в пижами. Vogue разкрива, че стилният ѝ уикенд е включвал още няколко специални визии: корсетна рокля, вдъхновена от Рита Хейуърт във филма „Джилда“, коктейлна рокля на Oscar de la Renta, украсена с верижки и кристали, бардови кадифен модел на Dolce & Gabbana и пищна коприна с принт по картина на Каналето.

Пижаменото афтърпарти „Dolce Notte“, организирано след сватбата, също не мина без блясък – Санчес се появи в ефектна Atelier Versace рокля без презрамки, богато бродирана с кристали, която със сигурност надхвърля типичните стандарти за парти в пижами. Vogue разкрива, че стилният ѝ уикенд е включвал още няколко специални визии: корсетна рокля, вдъхновена от Рита Хейуърт във филма „Джилда“, коктейлна рокля на Oscar de la Renta, украсена с верижки и кристали, бардови кадифен модел на Dolce & Gabbana и пищна коприна с принт по картина на Каналето.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[bg]German Larkin / Vogue Разкошната церемония във Венеция за над 50 млн. долара е последвана от липсата на тоалет от впечатляващата ѝ модна колекция. Само дни след разкошната венчавка на Лорън Санчес и създателя на Amazon Джеф Безос, организирана с италиански размах във Венеция и струваща над 50 милиона долара, една от булчинските ѝ рокли мистериозно е изчезнала. Според италианското издание Corriere della Sera, тоалет от впечатляващата сватбена колекция на Санчес липсва. Макар сред местните да се шушука, чероклята може да е открадната, до момента няма подаден сигнал или започнато разследване по случая. Все още не е ясно коя точно от зашеметяващите рокли на Санчес се е „изпарила“, но според Daily Mail най-ценната ѝ рокля – уникалната дантелена Dolce & Gabbana, с която тя мина под венчило, е в безопасност. Този впечатляващ модел е вдъхновен от визията на София Лорен в култовия филм „Houseboat“ от 1958 г., където тя се омъжва за Кари Грант. Роклята на Санчес впечатли с дълги ръкави, корсетен силует, висока яка и типична „русалка“ пола. Отпред бяха зашити 180 копчета – стилно подчертаване на уникалния дизайн. „Първоначално исках нещо модерно, изчистено и секси, а накрая се спрях на тоалет, който носи духа на момента и показва къде съм днес. Аз съм различна жена от тази преди пет години“, сподели новата госпожа Безос пред Vogue. „Това е голяма промяна спрямо очакванията – обикновено нося рокли с открити рамене или с дълбоки деколтета“, допълва 55-годишната бивша телевизионна водеща. Седмицата на сватбата премина с истински моден маратон: Лорън Санчес впечатли гостите на двете празнични вечери с винтидж рокля Alexander McQueen, декорирана с копчета, както и с флорална haute couture рокля на Schiaparelli. На самия сватбен ден тя се появи първо с бял костюм Dior и копринен шал Hermès, преди да облече булчинската рокля за церемонията. Пижаменото афтърпарти „Dolce Notte“, организирано след сватбата, също не мина без блясък – Санчес се появи в ефектна Atelier Versace рокля без презрамки, богато бродирана с кристали, която със сигурност надхвърля типичните стандарти за парти в пижами. Vogue разкрива, че стилният ѝ уикенд е включвал още няколко специални визии: корсетна рокля, вдъхновена от Рита Хейуърт във филма „Gilda“, коктейлна рокля на Oscar de la Renta, украсена с верижки и кристали, бардови кадифен модел на Dolce & Gabbana и пищна коприна с принт по картина на Каналето.

transcript: ✨Friday Feature Fog and Fury (Haven Thriller 1) by Rachel Howzell Hall Huge Thank you to booksparks for the free book and allowing me to be a summer ambassador! #SRC2025 Wrapping up the selections is a small town death that's questioned by a tenacious private investigator. Sound good? Check out the synopsis! After ten years on the force, LAPD cop Sonny Rush relocates with her elderly mother to peaceful Haven, California, to join her godfather's burgeoning PI business. What crimes could possibly happen in a town nicknamed “Mayberry by the Sea”? Sonny's first case: find Figgy, a missing goldendoodle last seen sporting a Versace collar. At least scouting out a dognapper gives Sonny a chance to get to know her new neighbors. Forty-eight hours in town and Figgy's disappearance entangles Sonny in an unwelcome reunion with her ex, one of Haven's wealthiest citizens. And when the body of a teenage boy is found along a popular hiking trail, Sonny is drawn into a web of strange beyond anything she ever saw in LA. Then comes a local's warning: question everything. Haven hides secrets that could destroy its idyllic facade. Or destroy Sonny first. Any fun weekend plans? What's your current read? #FogAngFury #RachelHowzellHall #MysteryBooks #SummerReading #BiblioPeeks 2025 new books about small town murder mystery bipoc reads book recs recommendations

transcript: Kim Kardashian may have peaced out from Venice, but she's not done sharing content from Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's over-the-top wedding weekend. Kim Kardashian/Instagram There's no keeping up with these jewels. Days after attending Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's $50 million wedding in Venice, Kim Kardashian's continuing to treat her Instagram followers to content from the star-studded weekend. On Thursday, the Skims co-founder shared snaps of her and sister Khloé's looks for the ceremony: an intricately embellished brown vintage Versace gown and a pink sequined Tamara Ralph Couture dress topped with a matching feathered cape, respectively. On Thursday, the Skims co-founder shared snaps of her and sister Khloé's looks for the wedding ceremony. Kim Kardashian/Instagram Kim wore vintage Versace, while Khloé was clad in Tamara Ralph Couture. Kim Kardashian/Instagram Explore More But we couldn't take our eyes off Kim's jaw-dropping gems from Moussaieff, which the star made sure to capture in several close-up shots. She wore not one, but two over-the-top necklaces, per the jeweler: a 105.69-carat multicolored diamond style suspended with a 50.46-carat fancy light yellow-brown diamond pendant, and a 63.23-carat white diamond design. Kim's neck wasn't the only thing dripping in precious jewels; she also wore earrings set with two pear-cut fancy deep orange-brown diamonds weighing in at just over 35 carats each and framed by 6.43 carats of white diamonds. Kim wore not one, but two over-the-top diamond necklaces from Moussaieff. Kim Kardashian/Instagram Together, the two necklaces were set with more than 200 carats of sparkling stones. Kim Kardashian/Instagram And the mogul finished off her look with a duo of Moussaieff rings, one featuring an 18.51-carat fancy dark orange-brown diamond and the other with a 22.99-carat fancy yellow-brown diamond. Khloé — along with family members Kendall, Kylie and Kris, who also attended the wedding — opted for pieces from Lorraine Schwartz. The Good American co-founder went for a dramatic diamond drop necklace set with six massive pear-cut stones in the center, while Kendall picked an emerald necklace-and-earring set that popped against her sheer black Tom Ford gown. Khloé, Kendall, Kylie and Kris all wore Lorraine Schwartz jewelry. Kim Kardashian/Instagram It would've been impossible to outshine the bride, though; Sánchez was dripping in diamonds throughout her wedding weekend, too. Nicolas Geradin And Kylie selected an array of white diamond pieces to complement her polarizing icy blue Dilara Findikoglu corset dress. Still, not even the Kardashian-Jenners could compete with the bride's bling. In addition to pairing her $2.5 million pink diamond ring from Bezos with an oval-cut Lorraine Schwartz rock seemingly twice the size, Sánchez was also gifted a multimillion-dollar diamond necklace from the Amazon founder before their big day, as Page Six exclusively reported.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[ro]Misterul planează asupra nunții de 20 de milioane de dolari a lui Jeff Bezos cu Lauren Sanchez, la Veneția, după ce una dintre cele 27 de rochii de nuntă ale doamnei Bezos a “dispărut”. Se pare că rochia ar fi de negăsit, după momentul în care ceremoniile s-au îmcheiat.  Ce informații au ajuns în presă Relatările inițiale din presa italiană au susținut că a fost furată de un „petrecăreț îmbrăcat elegant, care reușise să intre deși nu fusese invitat”. Cu toate acestea, conform celor mai recente informații, se crede că respectiva ipoteză nu este corectă. Mai trebuie notat și că la Poliție nu a fost depusă nici o plângere, notează DAILY MAIL. Nu se știe exact care anume dintre rochiile de designer a dispărut, dar este cert că nu era rochia albă din dantelă pe care Lauren, în vârstă de 55 de ani, a purtat-o pentru a se căsători cu fondatorul Amazon, în vârstă de 61 de ani. Miliardarul și fosta jurnalistă s-au căsătorit pe insula San Giorgio Maggiore, în fața unei mulțimi de oaspeți, majoritatea vedete. La câteva momente după ce a spus „Da,” mireasa a postat pe Instagram, împărtășind o fotografie cu ea și Jeff împreună, pe care a subtitrat-o cu data evenimentului. În imagine, Lauren „strălucea” în uimitoarea rochie de mireasă, cu mâneci florale din dantelă, un corset strâmt, un decolteu înalt, o fustă lungă cu o trenă enormă și nasturi în față. (Citește și: Ce a făcut Lauren Sanchez imediat ce a devenit soția lui Jeff Bezos. Cum a zis da, cum a ACȚIONAT!) Lauren Sanchez la Venetia. Foto: Profimedia Ce le-a povestit Lauren Sanchez reporterilor de la Vogue Pe lângă acestea, înainte de nuntă, Lauren a pozat în rochia de mireasă pentru o ședință foto cu revista Vogue. În timp ce discuta cu reporterii de la Vogue, Lauren și-a amintit că s-a simțit ca o „prințesă” în timpul probei rochiei, care a avut loc la Milano, Italia. „A fost o senzație mai puternică decât credeam”, a adăugat ea, vorbind despre momentul în care a îmbrăcat rochia pentru prima dată. Ea a dezvăluit, de asemenea, că Jeff Bezos a implorat-o să o vadă în rochie, dar, așa cum este tradiția pentru majoritatea mireselor, ea a explicat că nu îl va lăsa să dea cu ochii pe ea până în ziua cea mare. „Aproape că am cedat”, a recunoscut ea. „Dar vreau să fie o surpriză. Pe măsură ce îmbătrânești, nu te mai surprind multe lucruri. Abia aștept să-i văd fața”. Fotografii artistice pe un fundal de lux decadent Doar o oră mai târziu, Lauren a mai publicat câteva fotografii din culise cu rochia ei de mireasă făcute de Nicolas Geradin. Într-o postare de carusel, fosta jurnalistă era fotografiată într-o cameră de un lux decadent din Veneția, purtând rochia din dantelă cu gât înalt și arătând o siluetă dramatică. A doua fotografie, o imagine alb-negru, o arăta pe Lauren și echipa ei ajutând-o să intre în rochie, în timp ce a treia imagine îl arăta pe designerul Domenico Dolce așezându-i miresei voalul de dantelă pe cap. „Nu e doar o rochie, e o poezie”, a scris Lauren în legenda postării. „Mulțumesc @dolcegabbana pentru magia pe care ai făcut-o”. Mai târziu, Lauren a orbit mulțimea apărând într-o rochie Atelier Versace roz plisată, creată de Donatella Versace însăși, la petrecerea finală de nuntă. Spectaculoasa rochie de bal era confecționată din șifon de mătase și avea un corset brodat manual cu o serie de cristale Swarovski din aur roz, bronz și aur. Fosta jurnalistă a asortat acest look cu o geantă neagră încrustată cu bijuterii pe care scria: „Doamna Bezos” cu diamante transparente, un semn al noului său statut. (Citește și: Jeff Bezos și Lauren Sanchez, UMILIȚI de invitații la nunta de 50 de milioane de dolari. Ce nemulțumiri au vedetele prezente la Veneția)

transcript: SPR_COMBO[el]Αγνοείται ένα από τα 27 φορέματα που φόρεσε η Λόρεν Σάντσες στο γάμο της με τον Τζεφ Μπέζος. Σύμφωνα με τον ιταλικό Τύπο, έγιναν αναφορές για κλοπή από ένας «κομψά ντυμένο απρόσκλητο καλεσμένο», ισχυρισμός που πλέον δεν θεωρείται πιθανός, μιας και δεν έχει γίνει καμία επίσημη αναφορά στην αστυνομία. Διαβάστε: Σαρλίζ Θέρον: "Ο Μπέζος είναι χάλια, εμείς κουλ" - Καυστική επίθεση για τον γάμο στη Βενετία (Βίντεο) Να σημειωθεί πως αν και δεν είναι γνωστό ποιο από τα φορέματα έχει χαθεί, σίγουρα δεν πρόκειται για το λευκό δαντελένιο νυφικό με λαιμόκοψη τύπου ζιβάγκο από τους Dolce & Gabbana το οποίο φόρεσε η 55χρονη στον γάμο της με τον ιδρυτή της Amazon. One of Lauren Sánchez's wedding dresses may have vanished days after Jeff Bezos nuptials https://t.co/FxZRBeHeqv pic.twitter.com/ja34I51PSo — Page Six (@PageSix) July 3, 2025 Το εντυπωσιακό νυφικό της Λόρεν Σάντσες Υπενθυμίζεται ότι, το ζευγάρι παντρεύτηκε στη Βενετία, την Παρασκευή 27 Ιουνίου στο νησί Σαν Τζόρτζιο Ματζόρε, μπροστά σε λαμπερούς καλεσμένους. Η νύφη, λίγο μετά το γάμο ανάρτησε φωτογραφία στο Instagram μαζί με τον αγαπημένο της, με την λεζάντα να γράφει την ημερομηνία του γάμου της. Στο στιγμιότυπο αυτό, η Σάντσεζ παρουσίασε το εντυπωσιακό νυφικό της. Παράλληλα, η ίδια φωτογραφήθηκε με το εντυπωσιακό νυφικό της, πριν από τον γάμο, για το «Vogue». Μιλώντας στο περιοδικό, θυμήθηκε πως ένιωσε σαν «πριγκίπισσα» κατά τη διάρκεια της πρόβας του φορέματος στο Μιλάνο. «Ήταν πιο συγκλονιστικό απ' όσο περίμενα», ανέφερε για τη στιγμή που το φόρεσε για πρώτη φορά. Η ίδια συνέχισε αποκαλύπτοντας ότι ο -τότε- μέλλον σύζυγός της, την παρακάλεσε να του δείξει το φόρεμα της. Ωστόσο, παραμένοντας παραδοσιακή η Σάντσες κρατήθηκε και δεν το αποκάλυψε, δηλώνοντας χαρακτηριστικά: «Σχεδόν υπέκυψα», ενώ πρόσθεσε: «Αλλά ήθελα να είναι έκπληξη. Όσο μεγαλώνεις, δεν υπάρχουν πολλές εκπλήξεις στη ζωή. Ανυπομονώ να δω το πρόσωπό του». Τονίζεται ότι η Λόρεν Σάντσεζ εντυπωσίασε τα πλήθη και με ένα ροζ φόρεμα από μεταξωτή μουσελίνα Atelier Versace, σχεδιασμένο από την ίδια τη Ντονατέλα Βερσάτσε, για το τελευταίο γαμήλιο πάρτι. Το συγκεκριμένο ρούχο είχε κορσέ, κεντημένο στο χέρι με ροζ χρυσούς κρυστάλλους Swarovski.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]Publicado por Anna Pardo Periodista especializada en moda, belleza y lifestyle Creado: 4.07.2025 | 19:40 Actualizado: 4.07.2025 | 19:40 Elegir perfume puede ser un auténtico desafío cuando la oferta es interminable y cada marca promete lo mismo. Sin embargo, hay una pista infalible para las amantes de la perfumería: el listado de los más vendidos de Amazon España. Allí, prácticamente a diario, se actualiza el ranking de colonias y perfumes que triunfan, y sí, los aromas dulces y los toques especiados siguen siendo los favoritos. Dentro de ese top 50 hay una fragancia que no pasa desapercibida y que se ha convertido en una de las joyas de la temporada: Eros de Versace. Este eau de toilette acumula nada menos que 18.000 valoraciones y una media de 4,6 estrellas, todo un síntoma de que su combinación de frescura, sensualidad y potencia funciona las 24 horas del día. Tengo más de 150 perfumes y este mi nuevo favorito para el verano: fresco, afrutado, tropical y de larga duración Una colonia que conecta con la esencia de la Antigua Grecia Eros de Versace, un favorito infalible dentro de nuestro país Lo que hace único a Eros es su capacidad de mezclar historia, seducción y frescura en un solo frasco. Esta fragancia masculina, lanzada en 2012, se inspira en la mitología griega y rinde homenaje al dios del amor, Eros, hijo de Afrodita. El propio frasco, tallado en cristal turquesa y coronado por la cabeza de Medusa, es toda una declaración de intenciones. Detrás de este aroma está el perfumista Aurélien Guichard, quien ha logrado encapsular el espíritu vibrante de Versace en un perfume con carácter propio. Las fanáticas de las colonias cítricas más frescas y aromáticas no tardarán en apreciar la combinación inicial de menta, manzana verde y limón, que se funden en un arranque chispeante y refrescante. Eros de Versace De hecho, el corazón de Eros apuesta por una mezcla moderna y sofisticada de haba tonka, ambroxan y geranio, aportando calidez sin renunciar a la frescura. El resultado es un perfume versátil, con ese toque fougère que lo hace tan masculino como atemporal. Su estela se completa con una base envolvente de vainilla de Madagascar, cedro de Virginia, vetiver y musgo de roble. En Amazon, acumula un total de 18.722 valoraciones y una nota excelente. Todo ello acompañado de halagos como "aroma fresco nada cargante, duradero y sutil". En cuanto al precio, Eros de Versace es una opción que, ahora mismo, se puede conseguir en Amazon por 43,40 euros en su formato de 50 ml, mientras que en la web oficial de Versace el mismo tamaño se vende por 86 euros. Paseando por Niza me pararon para preguntarme qué perfume llevaba: una colonia cítrica, fresca y chispeante que cumple 70 años Otras colonias que se cuelan entre las más vendidas en Amazon Gloria Vanderbilt N°1 Eau de Toilette Gloria Vanderbilt N°1 Eau de Toilette Esta fragancia, lanzada en 1982, mantiene su lugar en el ranking por méritos propios y por ser una de esas colonias frescas de mujer que son un éxito desde hace años. Creada por la prestigiosa nariz Sophia Grojsman, Vanderbilt es un perfume oriental floral que despliega un aroma inconfundible desde el primer instante. Su pirámide olfativa arranca con notas de aldehídos, flor de azahar, piña, lavanda y bergamota, aportando un frescor delicado y vibrante. El corazón floral, con jazmín, rosa, ylang-ylang, clavel y tuberosa, deja paso a un fondo cálido de vainilla, sándalo, canela y almizcle, generando una estela femenina y duradera. Perfecta para las amantes de los aromas clásicos con un toque vintage, esta fragancia sigue conquistando generaciones. Su precio es otro de sus grandes atractivos: en Amazon, los 100 ml de Gloria Vanderbilt N°1 cuestan 7,74 euros, mientras que en Clarel se encuentra por 9,99 euros. Temas: Amazon Belleza Colonias Perfumes Productos de belleza

transcript: In a press release, Donatella said the campaign was "all about friendship, loyalty, and love" Virginia Chamlee Link copied Mert & Marcus/Versace Kate Moss (left), Claudia Schiffer NEED TO KNOW Donatella Versace brought back several friends of the fashion house to close out her nearly 30-year chapter at the helm of Versace, including Claudia Schiffer and Kate Moss in the campaign imagery In a press release, Donatella said the campaign was "all about friendship, loyalty, and love" The campaign highlights what will be the final collection with Donatella at the helm, as she plans to step aside as the brand's chief creative officer and become its chief brand ambassador Donatella Versacebrought back several friends of the Versace brand to close out her nearly 30-year chapter at the helm. On July 3, the brand unveiled the images for its latest campaign — the last with Donatella as the head of the fashion house, as she will officially step aside as the brand's chief creative officer to become its chief brand ambassador. Versace marked the end of one of fashion's most defining eras by including multiple iconic supermodels in the campaign, including Kate Moss, Claudia Schiffer, Anok Yai, Kristen McMenamy, Amber Valletta and more. In a press release, Donatella, 70, said the "energy" on the campaign was "extraordinary." Mert & Marcus/Versace Kate Moss "It was all about friendship, loyalty, and love. These images were created to celebrate the soul of the Versace woman," she added. "Her strength, her spirit, her attitude, and her heart. Every collection is a story, and this campaign is the story of Versace. Inspiring the present and anticipating the future.” Natasha Poly, Saskia de Brauw, Liu Wen, Mica Argañaraz, Mila Van Eeten and Jacqui Hooper are also featured in the campaign, which was captured by long-standing collaborators Mert and Marcus. Mert & Marcus/Versace Claudia Shiffer According to Versace, the campaign functions as "a powerful dialogue between FW25 and archival dresses—iconic, definitively Versace silhouettes, formed of the House's signature metallic mesh." Donatella took over Versace following the 1997 murder of her brother Gianni Versace and has since been instrumental in shaping the label's identity in the modern era. Her tenure saw the brand expand its global reach while staying true to its signature bold, glamorous and unapologetically sexy aesthetic. Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer​​, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. Mert & Marcus/Versace Amber Valetta The designer confirmed the news in an Instagram post on Thursday, March 12, announcing that Dario Vitale would be taking over to become the brand's chief creative officer as of April 1, 2025. The PEOPLE App is now available in the Apple App Store! Download it now for the most binge-worthy celeb content, exclusive video clips, astrology updates and more! Mert & Marcus/Versace Liu Wen The post read, “Championing the next generation of designers has always been important to me. I am thrilled that Dario Vitale will be joining us, and excited to see Versace through new eyes. I want to thank my incredible design team and all the employees at Versace that I have had the privilege of working with for over three decades." Read the original article on People

transcript: SPR_COMBO[el]Το ρούχο αγνοείται από την ημέρα της τελετής, που πραγματοποιήθηκε στο νησί Σαν Τζόρτζιο Ματζόρε στη Βενετία 4 Ιουλίου, 2025 | 22:38 Ένα από τα 27 νυφικά φορέματα της Λόρεν Σάντσες έχει εξαφανιστεί μετά τον γάμο της με τον Τζεφ Μπέζος. Το ρούχο αγνοείται από την ημέρα της τελετής και οι πρώτες αναφορές στον ιταλικό Τύπο έκαναν λόγο για κλοπή από έναν «κομψά ντυμένο απρόσκλητο καλεσμένο». Ωστόσο, αυτή η εκδοχή πλέον δεν θεωρείται πιθανή και δεν έχει κατατεθεί καμία επίσημη αναφορά στην αστυνομία. Επίσης, δεν είναι γνωστό ποιο από τα φορέματα έχει χαθεί, ωστόσο δεν πρόκειται για το λευκό δαντελένιο φόρεμα με λαιμόκοψη τύπου ζιβάγκο από τους Dolce & Gabbana, το οποίο φόρεσε η 55χρονη στον γάμο της με τον ιδρυτή της Amazon, στη Βενετία, την Παρασκευή 27 Ιουνίου. Το ζευγάρι παντρεύτηκε στο νησί Σαν Τζόρτζιο Ματζόρε, μπροστά σε λαμπερούς καλεσμένους. One of Lauren Sánchez's wedding dresses may have vanished days after Jeff Bezos nuptials https://t.co/FxZRBeHeqv pic.twitter.com/ja34I51PSo — Page Six (@PageSix) July 3, 2025 Η Λόρεν Σάντσες ανάρτησε στο Instagram φωτογραφία της μαζί με τον Τζεφ Μπέζος, λίγο μετά το μυστήριο συνοδεύοντας τη με την ημερομηνία του γάμου. Στο στιγμιότυπο αυτό, η Σάντσεζ παρουσίασε το εντυπωσιακό νυφικό της. Δείτε τη φωτογραφία Φωτογραφήθηκε μάλιστα με το νυφικό της, πριν από τον γάμο, για το «Vogue». Μιλώντας στο περιοδικό, θυμήθηκε πως ένιωσε σαν «πριγκίπισσα» κατά τη διάρκεια της πρόβας του φορέματος, η οποία έγινε στο Μιλάνο. «Ήταν πιο συγκλονιστικό απ' όσο περίμενα», ανέφερε για τη στιγμή που το φόρεσε για πρώτη φορά. Αποκάλυψε επίσης, ότι ο Τζεφ Μπέζος την παρακάλεσε να του δείξει το φόρεμα, αλλά, όπως συνηθίζεται, εξήγησε πως δεν θα του το αποκάλυπτε πριν τη μεγάλη ημέρα. «Σχεδόν υπέκυψα», παραδέχτηκε και πρόσθεσε: «Αλλά ήθελα να είναι έκπληξη. Όσο μεγαλώνεις, δεν υπάρχουν πολλές εκπλήξεις στη ζωή. Ανυπομονώ να δω το πρόσωπό του». Η Λόρεν Σάντσεζ εντυπωσίασε και με ένα ροζ φόρεμα από μεταξωτή μουσελίνα Atelier Versace, σχεδιασμένο από την ίδια τη Ντονατέλα Βερσάτσε, για το τελευταίο γαμήλιο πάρτι. Το συγκεκριμένο ρούχο είχε κορσέ, κεντημένο στο χέρι με ροζ χρυσούς κρυστάλλους Swarovski. protothema.gr

transcript: Invest UP to host business roundtables in major US and European cities, targeting tech, manufacturing and consumer giants The Uttar Pradesh government is taking its investment pitch global, anchoring a 'China+1' strategy to position the state as a dependable alternative for companies seeking to diversify supply chains. Under the banner of Invest UP, high-level roadshows and business roundtables will be held in New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, London, Paris, Frankfurt, Milan, Amsterdam and Birmingham, in partnership with Indian embassies and industry bodies such as USIBC, CII and FICCI. In the United States, discussions will target technology heavyweights like , Amazon Web Services, Azure and , as well as datacenter operators Equinix and consumer brands including Skechers, Mattel, Ralph Lauren and Coach. In Europe and the UK, the outreach focuses on automotive and engineering leaders BMW, Bosch and BASF, luxury houses Prada and Versace, and consumer staples firms such as Lego, Unilever and GSK. Chief Secretary Manoj Kumar Singh said these engagements go beyond mere investment invitations, aiming to build sustainable, employment-driven value chains. Backed by over 33 sector-specific policies, streamlined approvals and the digital single-window platform Nivesh Mitra, UP recorded the highest number of new factory registrations in India in 2024–25, he noted. Singh highlighted recent marquee investments: a ₹3,700 crore semiconductor and electronics facility by - OSAT; the establishment of a Prime Minister's MITRA mega textile park alongside ten mini clusters; the 2023 EV policy targeting 36 GWh of battery capacity by 2028; and the development of Noida–Greater Noida as a national hub for data centres and AI infrastructure. Together, these initiatives set Uttar Pradesh on course to become a global manufacturing and innovation powerhouse. Stay updated with the latest -

transcript: Tia Lee Graces the Cover of ELLE Malaysia: A Journey of Empowerment, Evolution, and Expression The feature comes on the heels of her massive success with "Goodbye Princess," which has surpassed 174 million views on YouTube — a testament to her global resonance and emotional storytelling. "Goodbye Princess" – Her Personal Anthem Among her discography, "Goodbye Princess" holds a special place. "This song reflects my emotional journey — from someone who used to hesitate to express herself to someone who can now be more at ease and confident in being who she truly is." Beyond music, the accompanying visuals and campaign became a cornerstone of her #EmpowerHer movement, which supports real-world empowerment for women by providing employment support and helping them rebuild their confidence. Empowerment Through Art and Action For Tia, music is a powerful vessel to communicate strength and self-discovery. "Right now, I want to express the sense of empowerment girls can find during their growth journey," she said. Her #EmpowerHer initiative, born during the creative process of "Goodbye Princess," channels proceeds and awareness toward tangible support for women facing societal pressures and stereotypes. "Small efforts, when multiplied over 365 days, can grow into something significant," she said. "Empowerment begins when we help one another rise — especially during tough times." A Style Icon with Substance Beyond music, Tia continues to shape global fashion discourse. Describing her style as "minimalism, comfort, and soft personality," she values timelessness and quality, often opting for classic silhouettes in neutral tones. Her fashion inspiration? Rosie Huntington-Whiteley — a woman she admires for her strength, elegance, and purpose. Tia's passion for fashion is on full display in her ELLE Malaysia cover story, where she dons looks from Louis Vuitton, FENDI, Brunello Cucinelli, LOEWE, Ferragamo, Shu Shu Tong, TODS and Versace. transcript: SPR_COMBO[pt]Por trás dos figurinos cheios de referências dos anos 80, a figurinista Claudia Sandoval explica como construiu o estilo dos personagens “Você entra no mundo da Daniela, e tudo é rosa.” — Foto: Maria Grinda / Amazon Prime México Desde os primeiros dias após sua estreia, a conversa na internet sobre Mentiras, a série tem se concentrado no figurino usado por Belinda. E os rumores são verdadeiros: as peças de arquivo de marcas de luxo como Hermès, Louis Vuitton, Versace, Chanel e Dolce & Gabbana, que têm feito todos os criadores de conteúdo de moda comentarem e especularem, são, sim, do próprio guarda-roupa da atriz. Mas não se deixe enganar pelas aparências… À medida que a história de Mentiras, da Amazon Prime Video, se desenrola, a linha entre o que Belinda emprestou de seu próprio armário e o que ficou a cargo de Claudia Sandoval — a figurinista responsável por recriar a moda dos anos 80 usada por Daniela (sua personagem) e os demais — é bastante tênue. Ao mesmo tempo, foi ela quem deu aos personagens uma identidade própria expressa pelas roupas. E essa não foi uma tarefa simples. "Há por trás uma pesquisa super intensa, aqui estamos explorando os personagens muito mais a fundo. Antes era uma peça de duas horas, agora são oito episódios", comenta. Esse trabalho envolve questionar tudo sobre o personagem: quem ele é, quem são seus pais, por que se veste como se veste. Maeve Jinkings é capa Pride da Vogue Brasil "Sempre tive o 'não' como ponto de partida", diz Nany People Liliane Rocha: "Amar é sempre um ato revolucionário" O figurino de Belinda em Mentiras, a Série “Quando você entra no mundo da Daniela, tudo é rosa”, conta Sandoval. “As provas de figurino duravam horas e horas. Houve uma colaboração, porque ela, como todos os atores, tem um ponto de vista sobre seu personagem.” Assim se alinham as necessidades técnicas da produção — como o figurino aparecerá nos cenários — com a visão que os atores têm sobre seus próprios papéis. Com Belinda, em especial, um dos desafios foi conciliar sua agenda com os longos períodos de prova de figurino, já que, ao mesmo tempo, ela trabalhava no lançamento do álbum Indómita. “Daniela, se não me engano, tem cerca de 38 trocas de roupa na série.” Em um movimento inesperado — e pouco comum —, a atriz abriu seu guarda-roupa para Sandoval, pois sabia que algumas de suas peças combinariam perfeitamente com a personagem. “Belinda tem roupas que parecem de museu, é impressionante.” Entre elas, um casaco vermelho em forma de coração que Hedi Slimane criou para a coleção ready-to-wear de outono-inverno 2016 — justamente inspirada na moda dos anos 80. Também aparecem uma bolsa Louis Vuitton de edição limitada com penas rosa, um conjunto de camisa e calça da Versace usado como pijama, um vestido da Blumarine e, claro, sua icônica bolsa Hermès rosa-claro. “Há muitos momentos bem pequenos em que Daniela aparece e que mostram várias dessas trocas de roupa — como no flashback do avião e no da estreia no tapete vermelho. E esses momentos foram perfeitos para que Belinda nos emprestasse peças espetaculares do seu armário.” Depois, havia o "look herói", a roupa principal que Daniela usa durante toda a sequência na mansão Mijares. “O rosa, né? Aquele da Chanel”, me arrisco a dizer. “Não é Chanel, nós fizemos!” , responde Claudia. Em termos de produção, era preciso um traje que Belinda pudesse usar na cena mais longa da série — aquela que conduz a narrativa. Ele precisava ser imediatamente reconhecível. “O tailleur da Chanel que todos conhecem — se não for pela Jackie Kennedy, é pela Marge Simpson.” Um visual clássico e perfeito, que poderia facilmente ser confundido com outra peça preciosa do armário de Belinda. “Mandamos buscar o tweed em Nova York, recebemos vários tecidos e esse foi o escolhido depois de testarmos em câmera para ver como aparecia. Fizemos três versões idênticas para trocar durante as gravações.” Belinda veste um tailleur de tweed criado pela equipe de figurino de "Mentiras" — Foto: Divulgação/Maria Grinda / Amazon Prime México Quando falamos da estética da juventude de Daniela, surgem referências como os filmes Heathers e As Patricinhas de Beverly Hills, especialmente quando o visual pende mais para os anos 90. Algumas roupas eram originais dos anos 80, mas o desafio era levá-las ao universo todo rosa de Daniela. Por isso, o figurino foi recriado a partir de moldes originais da época, mas nos tons e formas que representassem a personagem. “Mas sempre havia o desafio de fazer tudo ter sentido. Daniela não tinha estilo só porque usava marca. Daniela tinha estilo porque ela tinha estilo, sabe?” Belinda, como Daniela, usando um conjunto esportivo rosa. — Foto: Maria Grinda / Amazon Prime México A figurinista de Mentiras, a série Claudia Sandoval é a figurinista de Mentiras, la serie, da Amazon Prime Video. Sua trajetória começou como estudante de moda no Centro (CDMX). Após a graduação, mudou-se para Nova York para continuar os estudos e lá começou a trabalhar em seus primeiros projetos com Ana Terrazas, com quem colaborou em produções como Roma, de Alfonso Cuarón, e Bardo, de Alejandro González Iñárritu, como supervisora de figurino. Claudia Sandoval e sua equipe durante as provas de figurino com Belinda. — Foto: Divulgação/Maria Grinda / Amazon Prime México Diferentemente das produções de Hollywood, o papel dos figurinistas no cinema latino-americano é muito menos conhecido do grande público....

transcript: The Uttar Pradesh government is taking its investment pitch global, anchoring a 'China+1' strategy to position the state as a dependable alternative for companies seeking to diversify supply chains. Under the banner of Invest UP, high-level roadshows and business roundtables will be held in New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, London, Paris, Frankfurt, Milan, Amsterdam and Birmingham, in partnership with Indian embassies and industry bodies such as USIBC, CII and FICCI. In the United States, discussions will target technology heavyweights like Google, Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure and Oracle, as well as datacenter operators Equinix and consumer brands including Skechers, Mattel, Ralph Lauren and Coach. In Europe and the UK, the outreach focuses on automotive and engineering leaders BMW, Bosch and BASF, luxury houses Prada and Versace, and consumer staples firms such as Lego, Unilever and GSK. Chief Secretary Manoj Kumar Singh said these engagements go beyond mere investment invitations, aiming to build sustainable, employment-driven value chains. Backed by over 33 sector-specific policies, streamlined approvals and the digital single-window platform Nivesh Mitra, UP recorded the highest number of new factory registrations in India in 2024–25, he noted. Singh highlighted recent marquee investments: a ₹3,700 crore semiconductor and electronics facility by HCL-Foxconn OSAT; the establishment of a Prime Minister's MITRA mega textile park alongside ten mini clusters; the 2023 EV policy targeting 36 GWh of battery capacity by 2028; and the development of Noida–Greater Noida as a national hub for data centres and AI infrastructure. Together, these initiatives set Uttar Pradesh on course to become a global manufacturing and innovation powerhouse. For the latest news from across India, Political updates, Explainers, Sports News, Opinion, Entertainment Updates and more Top News, visit Indian Express. Subscribe to our award-winning Newsletter Download our App here Android & iOS

transcript: SPR_COMBO[it]Si scrive Tedx e non ha nulla a vedere con Tex, il fumetto pubblicato dal 1958. È un evento. La «x» finale indica che viene organizzato localmente in modo indipendente, ma su licenza ufficiale concessa da Ted (acronimo di technology, entertainment, design, tecnologia, intrattenimento, design), organismo no profit con sede a New York, fondato nel 1984 da Richard Saul Wurman, architetto e designer, e Harry Marks, esperto di televisione e media. Nella nostra città esiste dal 2014 per iniziativa di Francesco Magagnino: «Alla prima conferenza vennero 150 persone nella sala più piccola della Gran Guardia», ricorda. Oggi in due giorni raduna più di 2.000 partecipanti, mobilita dai 60 agli 80 relatori, organizza oltre 20 laboratori, trova 72 sponsor, impegna 100 volontari. Il tutto all'insegna della gratuità: «Nessuno guadagna nulla». Il team di Tedx Verona, composto da circa 35 professionisti delle più svariate discipline che lavorano pro bono al progetto, è oggi uno dei primi fra i 220 esistenti in Italia. È divenuto talmente importante che il presidente Magagnino nei giorni scorsi è stato nominato dai dirigenti newyorchesi ambassador ufficiale della fondazione per l'Italia, al pari di Emilia Garito di Tedx Roma, ingegnera informatica. Però l'ambasciatore veronese, 43 anni, laureato in ingegneria e in economia all'Università di Trento, sposato con Claudia di Stefano, che lavora in Ibm, padre di Matilde (2 anni) e Olivia (nata a marzo), abituato da 15 anni a dividersi fra Milano e Verona, all'hobby culturale di Tedx ha affiancato un prestigioso incarico professionale: è responsabile per l'Italia, la Grecia e i Paesi dell'Est dell'area Ai (Artificial intelligence) di Accenture Song commerce, la divisione creativa e tecnologica focalizzata su marketing, design, esperienza cliente e trasformazione digitale. In pratica accompagna le aziende nell'uso dell'Intelligenza artificiale, o Ia che dir si voglia, per migliorare la relazione con i loro clienti. Lo fa in questa multinazionale nata dalla fusione delle parole accent e future, sede legale a Dublino, oltre 740.000 dipendenti nel mondo, fatturato annuo intorno ai 65 miliardi di dollari, presente in più di 120 Paesi. Accenture è uno dei colossi della consulenza insieme a Deloitte, Pwc, Kpmg, Ey e McKinsey. Magagnino deve la sua intelligenza naturale al padre Mario, docente nella facoltà di scienze della comunicazione dell'Università di Verona, e alla madre Marilina Sperandio, già insegnante di diritto ed economia all'istituto Pindemonte. Partiamo da Tedx. «C'entra la passione per il mondo digitale. Da bambino misi le mani sul primo computer, un 286 di fabbricazione russa, credo, di quelli con il monitor monocromatico e i caratteri a fosfori verdi su sfondo nero. Lo usavo nell'ufficio di papà per giocare a Tetris su un floppy disk gigante. Al primo anno di superiori mi fu regalato un pc tutto mio». C'è relazione con Tedx? «Sì, perché Tedx è un momento di incontro tra persone che sono appassionate di innovazione digitale. La mia tesi di laurea verteva sui sistemi adattivi, le tecnologie che hanno preceduto quelle di oggi. Partivamo dai modelli usati nella psicoanalisi per studiare la relazione uomo-uomo e li applicavamo alla relazione uomo-macchina». Roba da emicrania. «Due anni e mezzo fa è arrivata l'Intelligenza artificiale generativa, che ha cambiato le regole del gioco. Prima era una faccenda per super esperti, oggi aiuta le imprese a ottimizzare organizzazione e processi produttivi, a creare nuovi servizi. Tre lustri fa avevo vissuto la rivoluzione digitale nelle aziende. Ricorda quando Time nel 1982 mise in copertina il pc e lo proclamò "Man of the year", l'uomo dell'anno? Beh, qui siamo a una velocità mai vista prima. Da un cambiamento intergenerazionale siamo passati a uno stagionale». E Tedx lo racconta. «Presenta storie di lavoro, di sacrificio, di persone, di idee. Ha senso condividerle. Ho scoperto realtà aziendali veronesi straordinarie, come Clx, che ogni anno crea 250.000 immagini per Louis Vuitton, Dior, Celine, Gucci, Fendi, Versace, Bulgari, Ferragamo e altre griffe, e per riviste come Vogue, che le usano per pubblicità, app, web e stampa. Ricordo ancora l'avvincente relazione di Massimo Delledonne, professore ordinario di genetica all'Università di Verona, che fu il primo a scrivere la sua tesi di laurea con il pc, mentre i suoi colleghi ancora usavano la Olivetti Lettera 22. Nel 2014 ci preconizzò: "Un giorno in farmacia ci daranno medicine compatibili con il nostro patrimonio cromosomico". Aveva sequenziato per anni il Dna di tutti gli esseri viventi, a cominciare dal suo». Perché Ted ha nominato ambassador proprio lei? «L'evento annuale di Verona, del quale sono licenziatario, è uno dei più qualificati in Italia. Nel 2023 vennero qui 300 organizzatori di Tedx nel mondo, persino dall'Argentina, dal Giappone, dai Paesi arabi». Ha ospitato relatori famosi. «Molti. Fra loro, Simon Lancaster, l'ex ghost-writer del premier britannico Tony Blair. La sua relazione sul linguaggio segreto che assicura la leadership a chi raggiunge i vertici della politica e degli affari, tenuta a Tedx Verona nel 2016, finora è stata vista su Youtube da 4,7 milioni di persone». Sfruttate i social. «Parecchio. Abbiamo un pubblico giovane. Impressiona il fatto che a ogni nuovo evento almeno 180 candidati, in prevalenza donne, aderiscano all'appello per venire come volontari ad aiutare in Tedx». Come si chiamano coloro che partecipano a questi incontri? «Qualcuno li definisce tedxers, in italiano tedxari». Ho notato che hanno tutti la barba, tranne lei....

transcript: SPR_COMBO[de]Dieser Duft überzeugt mit einer frischen, süß-würzigen Note und ist die perfekte Wahl für warme Sommertage – nicht nur für ihn, auch für dich. Das ist das süß-frische Parfum für Männer Wenn du deinem Freund eine besondere Freude machen willst, liegst du mit „Versace Eros“ genau richtig. Der Duft kombiniert frische, fruchtige Kopfnoten wie Minze, Limonen, Apfel, Mandarine und Zitrone mit einem warmen, würzigen Herzen aus Salbei, Amber und Geranie. Die Basis überrascht mit einer süßen, verführerischen Mischung aus Patschuli, Zeder, Sandelholz, Vanille, Zedernholz und Vetiver – ideal für einen modernen, selbstbewussten Auftritt. „Versace Eros“ ist holzig-orientalisch und wirkt dennoch erfrischend. Die besondere Komposition macht den Duft zu einem perfekten Begleiter für den Sommer. Erhältlich ist er nicht nur bei Amazon, sondern auch bei Douglas. transcript: Donatella bids farewell with archives, supermodels and classic codes that sum up three decades at the helm of Versace. Donatella Versace, designer, entrepreneur and symbol of the brand, bids farewell to her position by reuniting the key figures who defined the house's imaginary. Versace's Fall 2025 campaign is not just a collection; it is a statement of affection. The campaign features Claudia Schiffer, Kate Moss, Amber Valletta, Kristen McMenamy, Natasha Poly, Saskia de Brauw, Anok Yai, Liu Wen, Mica Argañaraz, Mila Van Eeten and Jacqui Hooper. All of them, wrapped in metal, archive and silhouettes portrayed by Mert & Marcus. 'Every collection is a story, and this is the story of Versace,' said Donatella. There is no nostalgia. There is narrative. What you see in this campaign is an intimate farewell that is not meant to be tragic, but celebratory. And among the eternal codes of the house's clothes, the liquid metal and the impossible waists, the new Virtus bag appears, called to be the symbol of this new stage. All this comes after months of speculation, confirmed this year with the purchase of Versace by the Prada Group for 1.25 billion euros. And with it, the appointment of Dario Vitale as the new creative director. The changeover is now official. Even so, Donatella, far from leaving, will continue as Versace's global ambassador.

transcript: Versace Fall Winter 2025, Courtesy of Versace Donatella Versace's final campaign for the House that bears her name has arrived. With the Fall Winter 2025 visuals, the iconic designer delivers a parting message steeped in emotion, legacy, and unmistakable glamour. “Be yourself. Believe in yours. Break the rules,” she declares, an ethos that has defined her reign and now becomes its closing refrain. Photographed by Mert & Marcus , the campaign unites familiar faces and signature styles. Claudia Schiffer , Kate Moss , Kristen McMenamy , Amber Valletta , Natasha Poly , Saskia de Brauw , Liu Wen , Mica Argañaraz , Anok Yai, Mila Van Eeten and Jacqui Hooper return in looks that straddle both the past and present. Archival pieces, like the label's metallic mesh, appear alongside newer designs, including the Virtus bag adorned with the V-emblem. The collection reaffirms Donatella's long-standing fascination with contrasts: strength and sensuality, armor and elegance, control and chaos. Versace Fall Winter 2025, Courtesy of Versace The visuals are saturated in gold, casting a literal glow on the designer's final statement. According to Donatella, this campaign was about more than fashion: “The energy on this campaign was extraordinary. It was all about friendship, loyalty, and love.” Her parting words extend beyond the clothes, shaping the tone of a legacy rooted in bold femininity and fearless attitude. Over the years, Donatella championed unapologetic glamour while pushing boundaries for women in fashion. Each of her collections told a story, of power, seduction, rebellion, and this final campaign threads those stories together into one cohesive narrative. It becomes both a retrospective and a vision for the future, positioning the Versace woman not as a figure of the past, but as a timeless presence with unstoppable force. Versace Fall Winter 2025, Courtesy of Versace As Donatella steps down, Versace enters a new era under Dario Vitale , formerly of Miu Miu. While all eyes are now on what comes next, this final campaign stands as a culmination of one of fashion's most formidable creative tenures, an unapologetic farewell that reflects the House's past while daring it to evolve. View Gallery  11 images The post appeared first on DSCENE .

transcript: Hey frag fam, 24M from Delhi here. I've been into fragrances for a while now, but most of what I know today is thanks to this amazing community. Whether it was going down rabbit holes on old threads or reading all the reviews and recommendations, I've learned so much — and I genuinely want to thank all the fellow fragheads here for helping me become a more cognoscenti person in this world of scent. I started out with just 2–3 designer bottles, and looking back now, I'm genuinely proud of how far I've come. From blindly wearing basic stuff to now appreciating note breakdowns, flankers, seasonal wear — it's been a fun and nerdy ride I used ChatGPT to help organize this post, but all opinions are mine. Here's my current designer starter pack – 15 fragrances, quick thoughts, and ratings: 1. YSL Y EDP – My all-time favourite. Clean, fresh, sweet, gets compliments without even trying. 10/10 2. 1 Million Lucky – Hazelnut and plum combo that's just addictive. Discontinued and that hurts. 9/10 3. Acqua Di Giò Profumo – Classy AF. Smells like a CEO went for a walk by the sea. 9/10 4. YSL MYSLF – At first I was like meh… but it grew on me. Fresh, musky, different. 8.5/10 5. Dior Homme Sport 2021 – Ginger kick with a clean drydown. Very easy to wear. 8.5/10 6. Armani Code Parfum – Softer, modern version of the OG. Perfect for close settings. 8.5/10 7. Acqua Di Giò Parfum (2024) – The newest one, and honestly pretty good. Fresh with depth. 8/10 8. 1 Million EDT – Loud, sweet, and still works when I want to stand out. Club or winter frag. 8/10 9. Terre d'Hermès EDT – Smells like grown-man confidence. Dirty orange + vetiver vibe. 8/10 10. Versace Dylan Blue – My safe pick when I don't know what to wear. Just works. 8/10 11. Afnan SNOI – Aventus vibes with darker, fruitier twist....

transcript: Kendall was spotted with a Kelly bag valued around $75K, and Kylie posed with a Birkin valued around $300,000 NEED TO KNOW Kylie and Kendall Jenner are flaunting some very expensive handbags as they vacation in Saint-Tropez, France Kendall was spotted balancing an Hermès Kelly Doll Picto bag on her head as she took a shot, and Kylie shared a photo to Instagram posing with a Birkin 20 Sellier Neige White Faubourg House Alligator Bag The sisters have been vacationing in France just after attending Jeff Bezos' star-studded wedding in Venice, Italy Kylie and Kendall Jenner are soaking up the sun on their French summer vacation — and flaunting some very expensive handbags. Over the Fourth of July weekend, the sisters were spotted out and about in Saint-Tropez, France. In a video shared to her friend and influencer Devon Lee Carlson's account on Saturday, July 5, Kendall, 29, could be seen sitting at a restaurant table wearing a polka-dot dress and taking a shot as she balanced a purse on her head. Eagle-eyed fans quickly pointed out that this wasn't any purse that the 818 Tequila founder was balancing on her head — the bag is a limited-edition yellow and white Hermès Kelly Doll Picto, according to Sotheby's, and the bag can easily fetch upwards of $75,000 on the resale market. Kendall Jenner. Kylie Jenner/Instagram In a post shared to German businessman and reality TV star Robert Geiss' Instagram, Kylie could be seen pulling off the same trick, balancing the Kelly bag on her head as she sipped a martini with a pair of sunglasses on her face. This wasn't the only designer bag the sisters have trotted out for their French vacation. In another Instagram post shared to 27-year-old Kylie's account on Sunday, July 6, the Kylie Cosmetics founder included some photos of her beach-ready outfits — one of which included a white knit bra, skirt and corset look. To complete her outfit, Kylie clutched a White Birkin Faubourg House Alligator Bag, which can fetch anywhere from $200K to upwards of $300K, according to Sotheby's. Kylie Jenner. Kylie Jenner/Instagram Other photos in the post included Kendall, Kylie and their group of friends watching Love Island USA on a tiny laptop, posing for a photo at a restaurant table, hopping into the ocean and looking out into the water from a boat at night. Kylie also showed off another outfit she paired with the Kelly bag, which featured a white cutout halter top and a matching bubble skirt — a custom look by Isabel Marant, per Vogue — as well as a pair of slingback black heels. Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer​​, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. During a day of fun in the sun at Loulou Beach Club on Pampelonne Beach, the pair were previously photographed going out into the waves with their beach cover-ups still on. Kendall wore the same sheer black cap-sleeve minidress with white polka-dots, which showed a black string bikini underneath when wet. Her hair was pulled back in a half-up-half-down style that featured a middle part. To round out her beach day look, the 818 founder wore a pair of black sunshades. The siblings' trip with friends to Saint-Tropez comes just after they recently attended Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez's star-studded wedding in Venice, Italy. Kylie arrived to the billionaire couple's nuptials in a silvery blue corset gown, and Kendall wore a black mesh dress paired with 110 carats of Colombian emeralds by Lorraine Schwartz. Kendall, Kris and Kylie Jenner leave the Gritti Palace Hotel for a party on the third day of the wedding of US Amazon founder Jeff Bezos with Lauren Sanchez. Stefano Rellandini / AFP The PEOPLE App is now available in the Apple App Store! Download it now for the most binge-worthy celeb content, exclusive video clips, astrology updates and more! Sisters Kim Kardashian and Khloé Kardashian, as well as family matriarch Kris Jenner, were also in attendance in Italy. For the June 27 ceremony, the ladies took water taxis while in the Floating City, with the SKIMS mogul, 44, going glam in a black Versace dress with a V-neckline and a textured design at the bust and along the sides as well as a pair of dark sunglasses to round out her look. Khloé, 41, also rocked a pair of black sunshades, though the Good American businesswoman chose pretty in pink over a dark-colored dress. Her strapless gown also touted a plunging neckline with subtle boning, teamed with a massive feather boa for added drama.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[fr]All products featured on GQ France are independently selected by GQ France editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, Condé Nast may earn an affiliate commission. C'est le coup d'envoie des Amazon Prime Day 2025 ! Depuis ce matin et jusqu'au 11 juillet, les réductions pleuvent ainsi sur des milliers de produits de grandes marques. L'occasion pour les membres Amazon Prime de réaliser de supers économies. Ces derniers profitent en plus de la livraison en 1 jour ouvré en France Métropolitaine sur des millions d'articles. Mais pas de panique si l'on est pas encore inscrit. Amazon dévoile en effet un essai gratuit de 30 jours permettant de jouir de ces journées de promotions mais aussi de nombreuses autres fonctionnalités comme Prime Video et Amazon Music en illimité. Une raison, s'il en fallait une de plus, de craquer pour une montre en ce début d'Amazon Prime Day 2025. Profitez de l'essai gratuit d'Amazon Prime PS : Nous mettrons cet article à jour régulièrement tout au long des Amazon Prime Day 2025 afin de vous proposer les meilleures offres à ne surtout pas louper ! Les meilleures offres sur les montres en ces Amazon Prime Day 2025 C'est un indispensable du quotidien devenu un véritable élément de style. Bien loin de leur fonction première, les montres dévoilent aujourd'hui une multitude de designs et de fonctionnalités. Si les modèles analogiques ou chronographes sont plus recherchés pour leur esthétique que pour leur praticité, les versions connectées ont clairement révolutionné le marché. Les montres deviennent ainsi une extension du téléphone, voire même le remplacent carrément. Elles dévoilent également des données de santé et sportives auxquelles on n'avait tout simplement pas accès avant. Et ce sans oublier la dimension mode ! Quand les marques de luxe et les indétrônables comme Philippe Plein, Daniel Wellington ou Hugo Boss tiennent toujours le haut du pavé côté modèles classiques, de nouveaux acteurs ont fait leur apparition pour s'imposer dans le domaine connecté. Les géants de la tech tels qu'Apple, Samsung et Google sont bien évidemment de la partie mais des marques comme Garmin et Polar occupent aussi les premières marches du podium. Le mieux : tous ces modèles et marques sont disponibles à prix mini sur Amazon pour les Amazon Prime Day 2025. L'occasion ou jamais d'ajouter un nouvel accessoire à sa collection avec cette sélection de montres Amazon pour homme que l'on a hâte de vous présenter. Une montre analogique Rien de mieux que les valeurs sûres pour s'assurer un style sans faille. Et ces montres analogiques le prouvent. Cadeaux intemporels par excellence, ils sont l'assurance de faire plaisir. Mais choisir le modèle idéal peut se révéler complexe. Budget, marque, forme, couleur, les possibilités sont multiples. Pour être sûr de tomber juste, nous avons jeté notre dévolu sur quatre modèles bien distincts, adaptés à tous les styles et budgets. De la sportive Timex à l'abordable Lotus en passant par la sobre Daniel Wellington ou la haut-de-gamme et audacieuse Versace, vous trouverez forcément votre bonheur. Lacoste analogique à quartz noir €99.00, Amazon Achetez maintenantTimex TW4B14200 €79.00, Amazon Achetez maintenantInvicta Pro Diver or et argent €135.00, Amazon Achetez maintenantMontre analogique Quartz T49961 Timex €65.00, Amazon Achetez maintenantUne montre chronographe Allier design classique et données sportives, c'est possible grâce aux montres chronographes. En plus d'indiquer les heures, minutes et secondes, elles développent une fonction chronomètre bien pratique. Fiable au millième de seconde près, il suffit de presser un bouton pour actionner l'aiguille. Et ce tout en arborant des mini-cadrans hautement désirables. Gold pour Philippe Plein, cadran bleu et bracelet argent pour Maserati et Hugo Boss ou encore total look black twisté de chronos verts pour D1 Milano, ce ne sont pas les déclinaisons qui manquent ici. transcript: Yea, usually the perfumes they're duping I can easily find the OG on outlet retailers for just as cheap or maybe $20 more...and those retailers have A+ ratings with the Better Business Bureau (I checked them all) that have been in business 20 years online - so they're NOT selling fakes. They're just not. Business go out of business all the time and have to auction off their authentic perfumes to outlet retailers, older perfumes stop selling, and they have to clear inventory for new perfumes, as well. I bought Versace Crystal Noir was $40 on ForeverLux since thats a 20 year old perfume - it hit outlet retailers like 17 years ago and they've done nothing but accumulate those perfumes. Then there are testers that are even cheaper. In fact, I've seen a Maison Alhambra VS Bombshell dupe selling for MORE on Amazon than the actual VS Bombshell on Fragrancenet/ForeverLux/Fragrancebuy(!) - which is usually in the links to your favorite perfume influencers on youtube where they earn a commission. So if it's good enough for them, the Better Business Bureau to give them an A+, and having never bought a fake from any of those 3 websites, it's good enough for me. transcript: SPR_COMBO[it]È l'8 luglio e in molti vedono avvicinarsi le ferie. Diciamoci la verità, ci va poco di parlare della Paris Fashion Week (autunno/inverno, questo sconosciuto) e dei front row ai quali comunque non partecipiamo. La domanda fondamentale non è, stavolta, quella sulla vita l'universo e tutto quanto ma è solo "cosa mettiamo in valigia?". Per gli ultimi giorni prima delle vacanze c'è voglia di leggerezza, e chi dice leggerezza dice "guarderemo i look delle vip in location esotiche e capiremo se c'è qualche spunto da copiare". Che è proprio quello che faremo in questa ultima newsletter prima dell'estate vera e propria (sì, va in ferie anche la sottoscritta). Il bikini a fantasia (come Dua Lipa) Si aggira per i vicoli di Napoli con il futuro marito, si tuffa nelle acque cristalline delle Baleari insieme alle sue amiche e lo fa rigorosamente in costume a triangolo a fantasia. Il suo preferito - almeno a giudicare da Instagram - è animalier, ma sfoggia volentieri anche un modello a pois (una delle fantasie dell'estate) con inserti di pizzo. Quello per la vacanza spagnola è invece tempestato di cristalli. Il che la dice lunga sui modelli dell'estate: divertenti e dalle linee semplici. Il costume intero? Non pervenuto. Olivia Rodrigo e l'abitino gingham Non è che staremo sempre in spiaggia: certo, a questo punto potremmo non farcela per Wimbledon, ma un abitino bon ton in valigia può sempre servirci per un aperitivo o simili. Sceglietelo come il suo: a quadretti (in gergo gingham), altra fantasia estiva che a sorpresa ha invaso le boutique e tutti i guardaroba delle star, vedere anche alla voce Bella Hadid e Daisy Edgar Jones (il suo, bianco e nero, è già sold out), che lo scelgono in versione prendisole. Il plus? Vi potete sbizzarrire sul colore.  Alexa Chung e la bandana Un occhio (anche alla comodità): avete presente quando, in spiaggia o durante un giro in barca, i capelli svolazzano e sembrate appena uscite dalla seduta di un parrucchiere pazzo? Fortunatamente è tornata di gran moda la bandana, che risolverà tutti i vostri problemi di bad hair day oltre a donarvi quel tocco glam necessario per le foto su Instagram. Come indossarla? Non come Axl Rose ma come vostra nonna. Letteralmente. Fidatevi.  Il parka come gli Oasis La maggior parte del genere umano non è riuscita ad accaparrarsi un biglietto per la reunion dell'estate. Ma qualcuno andrà in montagna: ed è lì che il mood "fratelli Gallagher" potrà davvero sbizzarrirsi: secondo i dati raccolti Shopify il mese di giugno ha registrato un boom di ricerche per tutti i capi di abbigliamento che hanno reso iconici il duo inglese. Leggi parka, le felpe sportive (come le loro ironiche @adidas), bucket hat e giacche trucker.  PILLOLE FASHION L'ultima campagna di Donatella. A marzo è arrivato il temuto annuncio: Donatella ha lasciato la guida creativa di Versace. Il colpo di teatro però era in agguato: per la campagna che segna il suo ultimo atto Donatella ha rispolverato i nomi che hanno reso grande la maison. Kate Moss, Claudia Schiffer, Amber Valletta fotografate da Mert & Marcus per una collezione autunno-inverno dal fascino anni Novanta, che tanto ci piace.  La nuova era di Celine. Per ogni ultimo atto ce ne è un primo: è appena partita ufficialmente l'era di Michael Rider che subentra a Hedi Slimane come direttore creativo di Celine. La collezione, che è stata giudicata positivamente da un po' tutti, non rivoluziona ma rielabora i codici della Maison, come si dice in gergo, mescolandoli con un po' di ironia.  © RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA

transcript: NEED TO KNOW Lily James revealed a shocking hair transformation while out in London Days before, the actress had been spotted with her usual honey blonde locks while at Glastonbury 2025 James has previously undergone dramatic hair transformations for photo shoots and acting roles Lily James is going to the dark side. On Saturday, July 5, the actress, 36, stepped out in London with a dramatic new look. In place of her usual honey blonde locks, James sported dark brunette hair that fades into a deep blue-black at the ends. The star was spotted on a casual stroll wearing navy leggings, a brown leather jacket and tan clogs. She carried a white canvas tote bag over her shoulder and wore little to no makeup. On Monday, July 7, James showed off her new look via . In a mirror selfie that appeared to be taken in a gym, the Baby Driver actress posed in a sports bra and leggings, her newly dark hair piled into a messy bun atop her head. Days before debuting her brunette transformation, James was seen with her usual lighter hair color at Glastonbury 2025. In an Instagram shared on June 29, the actress posed with actress Billie Piper at the festival. NASH / BACKGRID Lily James. The recent hair transformation is hardly James' first. In 2022, the actress donned a black wig with blunt bangs and bleached eyebrows in Versace's Fall/Winter 2022 campaign shot by famed duo Mert Alas and Marcus Piggott. Her ensemble in the campaign was also not lacking in drama; she wore a black corset with latex gloves while holding up the fashion house's new Greca Goddess bag. In another photo shared by the luxe Italian label's chief creative officer Donatella Versace on , James is wearing a corseted red dress with red boots and a red bag. The PEOPLE Puzzler crossword is here! How quickly can you solve it? Play now! NASH / BACKGRID Lily James. James famously underwent a dramatic transformation to play Pamela Anderson in the 2022 Hulu miniseries Pam & Tommy. In an interview with Variety, the show's hair department lead Barry Lee Moe revealed that the actress had to go through "anywhere from three to five hours of hair and makeup every morning." Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. More in Celebrity James said that the physical transformation was both "freeing and liberating" in a 2022 cover story for Net-a-Porter's Porter. "Slowly, our incredible team found a balance where I resembled Pamela but also felt like I could act through it," the actress shared, noting that she would be in makeup for about four hours starting at 3 a.m., putting on a chest plate, wig and tan. She continued, "I've never done anything where I look very different from myself before. And I'd really like to continue in this vein, because I felt there was something very freeing and liberating in it. There was a bravery that came from that. A courage that came from… disappearing."

transcript: Lauren Sanchez stepped out in Paris for dinner with Brooks Nader on Tuesday She is still in Europe following a whirlwind wedding in Venice to Jeff Bezos Newlywed Lauren Sanchez looked red hot as she stepped out in Paris on Tuesday night to enjoy dinner with model Brooks Nader. Sánchez, who wed Amazon tycoon Jeff Bezos last month in a lavish, multi-day Venetian extravaganza, wore a latex dress by Versace, as she stepped out in the City of Lights. The formfitting bright red garment featured a corset bodice - that showcased her ample cleavage - as well as ruching at the skirt. It is currently retailing for $3,515 on luxury resale site Vestiaire Collective. The dress hit Lauren, 55, right above the knee and she paired the look with strappy black heels. It has also been worn by a few other celebrities this year, like model Amelia Gray Hamlin. The new Mrs. Bezos finished off the look with her hair sleek and straight, and carried a black crocodile Hermès Kelly bag, which typically has a resale value of over $50,000. Brooks Nader, 28, looked equally as glamorous for their Parisian night out, as she wore a pair of black capri pants and a totally sheer black halter blouse that left very little to the imagination. This week is the Paris Haute Couture Week, which runs from July 7 to the 10. Lauren's husband, Jeff Bezos, is expected to attend Allen & Co.'s annual leadership retreat in Sun Valley this week. It appears to be the first sighting of Sánchez after her whirlwind nuptials, of which Brooks also attended. The luxe event, which not only featured their actual wedding but multiple themed parties and brunches, saw them surrounded by 200 friends and family. A-listers like Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, and Kris Jenner all made an appearance, as well as Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates. Ellie Goulding performed at their reception, while Usher also sang at their pajama-themed brunch the next day. The happy couple got married in a restored amphitheater on the island, as Sánchez wore a high-neck, long sleeve lace Dolce & Gabbana gown that took over 900 hours of atelier to make, per Vogue. The gown featured a flared skirt, long veil, and a tight-fitting waist, with tons of buttons going up the middle. 'Very Lauren. Sexy, happy, not too serious, not too drama. Elegant but at the same time sensual,' Domenico Dolce told the outlet about the bride's dress. But the dress wasn't the only star of the show. The Blue Origin astronaut had many looks for the different occasions, including a pajama-themed party on their last night. Sánchez chose a strapless, dusty pink bustier Atelier Versace gown for the event, with bejeweled detailing all over the body - but it was her secret accessory that really stood out. Throughout the weekend, Lauren also wore many custom accessories that were a nod to her new last name, like a black rhinestone-encrusted black clutch bag that read, 'Mrs. Bezos' on it in silver gems. On the morning of her wedding, Sánchez stepped out in a cream, two-piece skirt suit by Dior, adding a personal touch as she wore a brown braided bracelet with diamond charms that read 'LB,' in honor of becoming Lauren Bezos. But for Sánchez, it's not about the dress or the accessories - at the end of the day, she's just happy to be married to Bezos, who she describes as the love of her life. 'I'm very happy,' she told the outlet. 'More than the dress, I'm happy that I'm getting married and I get to spend my life with my best friend, someone who sees me, someone who adores me, someone who I adore. I am the luckiest woman on the planet,' she shared.

transcript: Lauren Sánchez turned heads while rocking an impossibly waist-cinching mini dress after her wedding with Jeff Bezos. On Tuesday, July 8, the newlywed journalist, 55, was spotted while out and about in Paris with model Brooks Nader in photos obtained by the Daily Mail. SIGN UP for Parade's Daily newsletter to get the latest pop culture news & celebrity interviews delivered right to your inbox In the new snaps, Sánchez rocked a red latex dress by Versace. The look featured a corset bodice and a low-cut necklace that showed off her ample assets. Meanwhile, Nader, 28, donned a black sheer top that revealed almost everything on top with a pair of black pants. See the red-hot pictures of Sánchez and Nader here. Earlier in July, Sánchez made headlines for looking unrecognizable 20 years before marrying Bezos. She and the Amazon founder tied the knot on June 27 during a star-studded wedding ceremony in Venice, Italy. The three-day celebration included high-profile guests like Oprah Winfrey, Kim Kardashian, Bill Gates, Orlando Bloom, Leonardo DiCaprio, Barbra Streisand, Mick Jagger and more. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Lauren Sánchez Bezos (@laurensanchezbezos) Before Bezos, Sánchez was married to Patrick Whitesell from 2005 to 2019, during which they welcomed two kids, Evan and Ella Whitesell. She also shares a son, Nikko Gonzalez, with her ex, Tony Gonzalez. Bezos, 61, shares three sons and one daughter with his ex-wife, MacKenzie Scott. transcript: Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com Days after suffering a major wardrobe malfunction, Brooks Nader displayed her bare breasts while leaving Lauren Sanchez's dinner party in Paris, France. The Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue model, 28, went braless under a black see-through pussy bow blouse on Tuesday night. The shocking top left nothing to the imagination as Nader confidently exited Laperouse restaurant with a security guard in tow. The blonde bombshell completed her X-rated outfit with skintight capri pants, sky-high heels and a shiny black clutch. As for her glam, Nader's plump pout was drenched in lip gloss and her long hair looked extra voluminous for the invite-only occasion amid Paris Fashion Week. She left the party shortly after host Sanchez, who wowed paparazzi in a busty red latex dress by Versace. The new Mrs. Bezos, 55, finished off the look with her hair sleek and straight, and carried a black crocodile Hermès Kelly bag, which typically has a resale value of over $50,000. Also in attendance was Oscar-winner Leonardo DiCaprio, 50. Tuesday night's dinner coincided with the start of Paris Fashion Week, which will run from July 7 to the 10. The dinner also marked the first sighting of Sanchez since she and Amazon founder Bezos, 61, tied the knot in Venice, Italy last month. Both Nader and DiCaprio were among the 200 guests who attended the Italian nuptials, which cost a reported $20million and took place over three days. Also in attendance were celebrities like Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, Tom Brady and Sydney Sweeney. Days after partying it up at the star-studded wedding, Brooks hopped on a flight to London, England to attend Wimbledon. And while attending the world-famous tournament, the model suffered an unexpected wardrobe mishap. While she was in public, her period started and she bled through the fabric of her bright white skirt. The skirt had several blood stains visible along the back of it. But Brooks laughed off the snafu on TikTok, posting a video of herself getting confidently up from a table only for her sisters to start cringing at her. At that point she turned around and the shot ran down the length of her outfit, so that the stains were in clear view on camera. The Baton Rouge-born clotheshorse poked fun at herself the in text over the video as well, writing: 'tries to be chic,' and then: 'Starts [blood emoji] at Wimbledon.' Fans leapt into the comments to praise her for being 'real' and 'NORMALIZING it,' with one writing: 'A canon event for all us girlies.' 'The one time you wear something non sheer and maxi,' joked one commenter with crying, praying and heart emoji - earning a like from Brooks. Brooks waved off the mishap and sat cheerfully in the audience at Wimbledon that day, with her sister Sarah Jane right beside her.
