transcript: Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com Leonardo DiCaprio tried his best to keep a low-profile while exiting Jeff Bezos' new wife Lauren Sanchez's dinner party in Paris, France this week. The sighting comes less than two weeks after the Oscar-winner, 50, was branded a 'hypocrite' for attending the billionaire couple's $20million Italian nuptials. DiCaprio was brutally mocked online for seemingly trying to 'hide' from cameras during the three-day wedding by wearing a hat low down over his eyes and nose. And the Titanic star pulled a similar stunt on Tuesday night as he was photographed leaving the upscale Laperouse restaurant. Dressed in a casual all-black outfit, DiCaprio's famous face was barely visible behind an N95 and a black baseball cap, which he pulled down to cover his eyes. Excited fans watched as the actor was escorted to a nearby SUV by a well-dressed bodyguard. Missing from DiCaprio's side was his 27-year-old model girlfriend Vittoria Ceretti, who was his plus one to Sanchez and Bezos' controversial wedding. DiCaprio left shortly before dinner party host Sanchez, who wowed paparazzi in a busty red latex dress by Versace. The new Mrs. Bezos, 55, finished off the look with her hair sleek and straight, and carried a black crocodile Hermès Kelly bag, which typically has a resale value of over $50,000. Also in attendance was Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue model Brooks Nader. The runway maven, 28, looked equally as glamorous for Sanchez's get together in a totally sheer black halter blouse that left very little to the imagination and a pair of black capri pants. The dinner coincides with the start of Paris Fashion Week, which runs from July 7 to the 10. It also marked what appeared to be the first sighting of Sanchez since she and Amazon founder Bezos, 61, tied the knot in Venice, Italy last month. The luxe event, which not only featured their actual wedding but multiple themed parties and brunches, saw them surrounded by 200 friends and family, including DiCaprio and Brooks. A-listers like Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, and Kris Jenner were in attendance, as well as Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates. According to The Guardian, over 90 jets flew into the airport in the romantic city. Ellie Goulding performed at their reception, while R&B superstar Usher sang at their pajama-themed brunch the next day. The happy couple got married in a restored amphitheater on the island, as Sánchez wore a high-neck, long sleeve lace Dolce & Gabbana gown that took over 900 hours of atelier to make, as per Vogue. However, the nuptials were met with fierce backlash by locals who gathered in St Mark's Square, the iconic heart of Venice, to protest during the three-day event. There were criticisms regarding over-tourism, how much Bezos pays in taxes and his environmental impact. Being that DiCaprio prides himself on being an environmentalist and climate activist, fans were shocked to learn that he was among the Bezos wedding attendees. Photos of him wearing his low baseball cap and tuxedo as he hopped aboard a water taxi quickly went viral as fans roasted his bizarre wedding look. 'Leo trying to hide because he's embarrassed to been seen there or what?' one person penned. ' What a sellout. Youre a climate activist you say, Leo? 'Leonardo DiCaprio we can still see you…,' another added. Calling out the star's 'hypocrisy,' one fan tweeted out: 'Leo has great advice which he doesn't follow himself. I'm sure there's a word for that...' However, some social media users came to DiCaprio's defense as they tried to explain his unique style choices. 'He dresses like that pretty much all the time unless he's doing a big event or publicity, I think he doesn't want to be recognized/approached by the general public which honestly I would do the same if I happened to be famous,' one fan speculated, before adding: 'Gross of him to go to this regardless tho.' DiCaprio faced further backlash in the days following the wedding as he leaned back into his environmentalist work after partying it up with some of the wealthiest people in the world. Taking to Instagram, the star posted an update about a Chilean island called Guafo which is 'now protected.' Along with sharing a picture of the island, Leonardo explained that it has been purchased by a private owner - which will now keep it 'protected from coal mining, timber logging and other destructive industries.' The area will also become a national park and the star further penned that Guafo Island is 'critical to global biodiversity and the overall health of our planet.' DailyMail.com reached out to DiCaprio's rep for comment but never heard back. DiCaprio added that the island houses 'breeding populations of seabirds' and also 'boasts Magellanic Penguins and a breeding population of Endangered Marine Otters...' He has previously been open about his activism and a few months earlier in March, he slammed the Albanese government for giving the green light to a mine expansion in Western Australia. Over on Reddit, social media users called out DiCaprio for being a 'hypocrite' after he had flown to Italy just days prior for the Bezos-Sanchez wedding and slammed him for supporting Bezos amid Amazon's substantial carbon footprint. One penned, 'Leo is a great actor but I never believed that nonsense about him caring about the environment.' Another wrote, 'Because he's a hypocrite. He wants us to believe that he's environmentally frugal so that he can fly his private jets and use his private yachts. Leonardo DiCaprio has always been a hypocrite and a phony. 'Anyone who uses a private jet and a private yacht everywhere they go does not care about the environment. He wants us to limit our usage so he can continue with his extravagance,' they added. A fan also shared, 'Wealthy/famous people like this assume their influence on others outweighs the damages they cause personally. As if they are carbon neutral on the backs of others personal sacrifices.' 'Wow....

transcript: Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com Newlywed Lauren Sanchez looked sensational in a red skintight dress as she enjoyed a night out in Paris, France with some of her A-list friends on Tuesday. It marks Sanchez's first public outing since she and Amazon tycoon Jeff Bezos, 61, tied the knot during their lavish $50million Italian wedding weekend last month. Sanchez and Bezos hosted 200 elite guests during the controversial three-day extravaganza — which many dubbed the 'Wedding of the Century.' The celebration continued this past weekend as the couple spent their 'honeymoon' partying on a yacht with recently split couple, Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom, in Capri. And on Tuesday night, a solo Sanchez ventured to Paris without her billionaire husband where she met up with Oscar-winners Leonardo DiCaprio, Sean Penn and model Brooks Nader and more stars for an upscale dinner at Laperouse restaurant. The new Mrs. Bezos, 55, made jaws drop upon arrival as she flashed her ample cleavage in a red latex dress by Versace, which retails for over $3,500. She finished off the look with her hair sleek and straight, and carried a black crocodile Hermès Kelly bag, which typically has a resale value of over $50,000. Sanchez was photographed exiting Laperouse, which is situated along the Seine and boasts private dining rooms, with a crew of security guards surrounding her. She smiled while being escorted to a nearby SUV as locals and paparazzi looked on in awe. Sanchez's model pal Nader put on an X-rated display for their night out in Paris by going braless under a black see-through pussy bow blouse. The shocking top left nothing to the imagination as Nader, 28, confidently exited Laperouse with a security guard in tow. The blonde bombshell completed her racy outfit with skintight capri pants, sky-high heels and a shiny black clutch. As for her glam, Nader's plump pout was drenched in lip gloss and her long hair looked extra voluminous for the invite-only occasion amid Paris Fashion Week. Nader's younger sister Sarah Jane Nader was also in attendance. The brunette beauty was pictured walking behind her model sister in a daringly low-cut top. DiCaprio — who was recently branded a 'hypocrite' for associating with Bezos — tried to keep a low-profile as he left the restaurant before Sanchez and Nader. Dressed in a casual all-black outfit, the 50-year-old famous face was barely visible behind an N95 and a black baseball cap, which he pulled down to cover his eyes. The look resembled viral photos from the Bezos-Sanchez wedding that showed a tuxedo-clad DiCaprio seemingly trying to 'hide' from cameras by wearing a hat low down over his eyes and nose. Missing from DiCaprio's side on Tuesday night was his supermodel girlfriend Vittoria Ceretti, 27. Instead, DiCaprio was joined by a single bodyguard as he made a beeline to a nearby chauffeured car parked outside of Laperouse. Penn, 64, rolled up the A-list gathering with his stunning 30-year-old girlfriend, Valeria Nicov. The Mystic River star looked slimmer than ever in a trendy neutral-toned outfit as Nicov, wearing a white blouse and black slacks, trailed behind him. The couple, who made their red carpet debut last December, were photographed walking into the restaurant separately. Socialite Natasha Poonawalla was also on hand for Sanchez's star-studded dinner in Paris. Bezos' absence from the dinner party was likely due to a scheduling conflict as he is expected to attend Allen & Co.'s annual leadership retreat in Sun Valley, Idaho this week. Days before Sanchez's Paris trip, the journalist and Bezos were spotted partying on a superyacht in the Mediterranean during what many believed was their honeymoon. The couple was joined by Katy Perry, Katy's ex-fiance Orlando Bloom and other friends as they soaked up in the sun over the weekend. However, DailyMail.com recently learned that the trip was technically not an official honeymoon for Bezos and Sanchez, who appeared to be enjoying their extended vacation following their Venice nuptials. The luxe three-day event, which not only featured their actual wedding but multiple themed parties and brunches, saw the couple surrounded by 200 friends and family. A-listers like Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, and Kris Jenner all made an appearance, as well as Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates. Ellie Goulding performed at their reception, while Usher also sang at their pajama-themed brunch the next day. The happy couple got married in a restored amphitheater on the island, as Sánchez wore a high-neck, long sleeve lace Dolce & Gabbana gown that took over 900 hours of atelier to make, per Vogue. The gown featured a flared skirt, long veil, and a tight-fitting waist, with tons of buttons going up the middle. 'Very Lauren. Sexy, happy, not too serious, not too drama. Elegant but at the same time sensual,' Domenico Dolce told the outlet about the bride's dress. But the dress wasn't the only star of the show. The Blue Origin astronaut had many looks for the different occasions, including a pajama-themed party on their last night. Sanchez chose a strapless, dusty pink bustier Atelier Versace gown for the event, with bejeweled detailing all over the body - but it was her secret accessory that really stood out. Throughout the weekend, Lauren also wore many custom accessories that were a nod to her new last name, like a black rhinestone-encrusted black clutch bag that read, 'Mrs. Bezos' on it in silver gems. On the morning of her wedding, Sanchez stepped out in a cream, two-piece skirt suit by Dior, adding a personal touch as she wore a brown braided bracelet with diamond charms that read 'LB,' in honor of becoming Lauren Bezos. But for Sanchez, it's not about the dress or the accessories - at the end of the day, she's just happy to be married to Bezos, who she describes as the love of her life. 'I'm very happy,' she told the outlet. 'More than the dress, I'm happy that I'm getting married and I get to spend my life with my best friend, someone who sees me, someone who adores me, someone who I adore. I am the luckiest woman on the planet,' she shared.

transcript: #showbiz #gossip #britain #uk Proper news from Britain - News from Britain you won't find anywhere else. Not the tosh the big media force-feed you every day! By CARLY JOHNSON and JANE HERZ FOR DAILYMAIL.COM Published: 01:24 EDT, 9 July 2025 | Updated: 01:30 EDT, 9 July 2025 Newlywed Lauren Sanchez looked sensational as she enjoyed a night out in Paris, France with some of her A-list friends, including Leonardo DiCaprio and Sean Penn, on Tuesday. It marks Sanchez's first public outing since she and Amazon tycoon Jeff Bezos, 61, tied the knot during their lavish $50million Italian wedding weekend last month. Sanchez and Bezos hosted 200 elite guests during the controversial three-day extravaganza — which many dubbed the 'Wedding of the Century.' The celebration continued this past weekend as the couple spent their 'honeymoon' partying on a yacht with recently split couple, Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom, in Capri. And on Tuesday night, a solo Sanchez ventured to Paris without her billionaire husband where she met up with Oscar-winners DiCaprio, Penn and model Brooks Nader and more stars for an upscale dinner at Laperouse restaurant. The new Mrs. Bezos, 55, made jaws drop upon arrival as she flashed her ample cleavage in a red latex dress by Versace, which retails for over $3,500. She finished off the look with her hair sleek and straight, and carried a black crocodile Hermès Kelly bag, which typically has a resale value of over $50,000. Sanchez was photographed exiting Laperouse, which is situated along the Seine and boasts private dining rooms, with a crew of security guards surrounding her. She smiled while being escorted to a nearby SUV as locals and paparazzi looked on in awe. Sanchez's model pal Nader put on an X-rated display for their night out in Paris by going braless under a black see-through pussy bow blouse. The shocking top left nothing to the imagination as Nader, 28, confidently exited Laperouse with a security guard in tow. The blonde bombshell completed her racy outfit with skintight capri pants, sky-high heels and a shiny black clutch. As for her glam, Nader's plump pout was drenched in lip gloss and her long hair looked extra voluminous for the invite-only occasion amid Paris Fashion Week. Nader's younger sister Sarah Jane Nader was also in attendance. The brunette beauty was pictured walking behind her model sister in a daringly low-cut top. DiCaprio — who was recently branded a 'hypocrite' for associating with Bezos — tried to keep a low-profile as he left the restaurant before Sanchez and Nader. Dressed in a casual all-black outfit, the 50-year-old famous face was barely visible behind an N95 and a black baseball cap, which he pulled down to cover his eyes. The look resembled viral photos from the Bezos-Sanchez wedding that showed a tuxedo-clad DiCaprio seemingly trying to 'hide' from cameras by wearing a hat low down over his eyes and nose. Missing from DiCaprio's side on Tuesday night was his supermodel girlfriend Vittoria Ceretti, 27. Instead, DiCaprio was joined by a single bodyguard as he made a beeline to a nearby chauffeured car parked outside of Laperouse. Penn, 64, rolled up the A-list gathering with his stunning 30-year-old girlfriend, Valeria Nicov. The Mystic River star looked slimmer than ever in a trendy neutral-toned outfit as Nicov, wearing a white blouse and black slacks, trailed behind him. The couple, who made their red carpet debut last December, were photographed walking into the restaurant separately. Socialite Natasha Poonawalla was also on hand for Sanchez's star-studded dinner in Paris. Bezos' absence from the dinner party was likely due to a scheduling conflict as he is expected to attend Allen & Co.'s annual leadership retreat in Sun Valley, Idaho this week. Days before Sanchez's Paris trip, the journalist and Bezos were spotted partying on a superyacht in the Mediterranean during what many believed was their honeymoon. The couple was joined by Katy Perry, Katy's ex-fiance Orlando Bloom and other friends as they soaked up in the sun over the weekend. However, DailyMail.com recently learned that the trip was technically not an official honeymoon for Bezos and Sanchez, who appeared to be enjoying their extended vacation following their Venice nuptials. The luxe three-day event, which not only featured their actual wedding but multiple themed parties and brunches, saw the couple surrounded by 200 friends and family. A-listers like Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, and Kris Jenner all made an appearance, as well as Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates. Ellie Goulding performed at their reception, while Usher also sang at their pajama-themed brunch the next day. The happy couple got married in a restored amphitheater on the island, as Sánchez wore a high-neck, long sleeve lace Dolce & Gabbana gown that took over 900 hours of atelier to make, per Vogue. The gown featured a flared skirt, long veil, and a tight-fitting waist, with tons of buttons going up the middle. 'Very Lauren. Sexy, happy, not too serious, not too drama. Elegant but at the same time sensual,' Domenico Dolce told the outlet about the bride's dress. But the dress wasn't the only star of the show. The Blue Origin astronaut had many looks for the different occasions, including a pajama-themed party on their last night. Sanchez chose a strapless, dusty pink bustier Atelier Versace gown for the event, with bejeweled detailing all over the body - but it was her secret accessory that really stood out. Throughout the weekend, Lauren also wore many custom accessories that were a nod to her new last name, like a black rhinestone-encrusted black clutch bag that read, 'Mrs. Bezos' on it in silver gems. On the morning of her wedding, Sanchez stepped out in a cream, two-piece skirt suit by Dior, adding a personal touch as she wore a brown braided bracelet with diamond charms that read 'LB,' in honor of becoming Lauren Bezos. But for Sanchez, it's not about the dress or the accessories - at the end of the day, she's just happy to be married to Bezos, who she describes as the love of her life. 'I'm very happy,' she told the outlet. 'More than the dress, I'm happy that I'm getting married and I get to spend my life with my best friend, someone who sees me, someone who adores me, someone who I adore. I am the luckiest woman on the planet,' she shared. Adblock test (Why?)

transcript: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos was nowhere to be seen as Lauren Sanchez enjoyed a lavish dinner with her famous pals in Paris this week Newlyweds Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez have been celebrating their honeymoon after tying the knot in a £48million wedding in Venice last month. Where most people usually spend their honeymoon enjoying a romantic break, the Amazon founder and his new bride opted to invite their famous pals to join them on the celebrations. Over the weekend, Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom were spotted with newlyweds Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez on what appeared to be part of the couple's honeymoon. Katy and Orlando, who said they are now focusing on co-parenting their daughter Daisy Dove, hopped on board Bezos' superyacht in the Mediterranean with their little girl. A few days later, Lauren jetted off to Paris without her new husband to enjoy a night out with a host of A-list friends, including Leonardo DiCaprio, Sean Penn and Brooks Nader. The famous pals were pictured leaving Laperouse restaurant after a lavish dinner. Lauren, 55, looked out of this world in a red latex dress from Versace. She completed the look with a black Hermes handbag and black sunglasses as she made her way out. Brooks went all out in capris, a mesh halterneck top with bow detailing and a black purse. Brooks' younger sister, Sarah Jane Nader, also joined in on the night. Sean and Leonardo, on the other hand, opted for casual looks as they walked out in baggy trousers, simple T-shirts and light jackets. Leonardo kept hidden in a black face mask with a cap pushed down over his face. Last month, Jeff and Lauren tied the knot in Venice despite threats and protests by anti-capitalists and locals. The 25-minute wedding ceremony saw the pair exchange vows in front of around 200 guests, including a number of high-profile celebrities. In attendance were the Kardashian-Jenners, Orlando Bloom and Oprah Winfrey, as well as Ivanka Trump and her family. Rania Al Abdullah, the Queen of Jordan also watched on, as did supermodels, actors and business-people. Guests were welcomed by a gospel choir, with the singers performing a rendition of Whitney Houston's Higher Love as the bride and groom entered. Most guests partied well into the early hours of Saturday, but some celebs slipped away early. Kim and Khloe Kardashian left the do early and had already left the country by the time some of the other guests woke up, having being spotted at Venice airport early in the morning. Jeff kept his party gifts fancy, giving his male guests ViBi Venezia blue velvet slippers. But Sanchez partook in some shameless marketing, handing out black open-toe slippers from Amazon, promoting the business empire that made her now-husband a billionaire. According to a well-placed insider involved in the event planning, it's said the couple were already legally married for at least a month before the wedding. They said: “They have been married for at least a month, more than a month. The marriage is fully legal and took place in America under American law.” Follow Mirror Celebs on TikTok, Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter,

transcript:
SPR_COMBO[zh]当61岁的亚马逊创始人贝佐斯挽着55岁的新娘劳伦·桑切斯走出威尼斯圣乔治马焦雷岛教堂时，全世界都听到了金钱落地的声音。 这场持续三天的世纪婚礼，豪掷5600万美元（约4亿人民币）！！！ 宾客名单闪瞎眼：随便抽出10位嘉宾，身价总和就超过605亿……名流巨富们坐着私人飞机赶来，把威尼斯运河变成了“全球最贵朋友圈”现场。 💍新娘手上那枚30克拉订婚钻戒（图三）价值500万美元！ 不过真正让时尚界尖叫的，是桑切斯在婚礼期间上演的“超模级时装秀”
👗说实在，她穿真的一点不输模特！ Versace的粉色刺绣水晶战袍和Dior白色套裙让她成为了全世界最富有女性之余还体验了一把顶级KOL的角色！ 不过如果你以为桑切斯只是靠“会穿”就锁死了首富那就太草率了，这位姐的逆袭史，简直就是《甄嬛传》叠加《穿Prada的女王》。 出身墨西哥移民家庭，童年穷到睡在外婆打工的车后座。 梦想当空姐翱翔蓝天，却因体重超标被拒。 靠着半工半读的狠劲，硬是拼到了南加州大学的奖学金。 更励志的是，她从小有“阅读障碍症”，看书比开飞机还难。 但姐偏不信邪，用加倍的努力硬刚，最终杀进竞争激烈的电视台，从端茶倒水的助理一路干到出镜记者、主播。 从著名体育主播Rory的情人，到NFL球星托尼·冈萨雷斯的娃他妈，再到好莱坞王牌经纪人帕特里克·怀特塞尔的夫人。 每段关系都是精准跳板，最终在亚马逊电影派对上，她等来了“终极BOSS”贝佐斯。 当两人婚外情被亲哥以20万美元卖给小报时，桑切斯冷静得可怕，发律师声明切割亲情，法院反判哥哥赔25万美元。 果然，能拿下首富的女人，心都是钛合金做的吧！ 不靠嫁人改变命运，她自己就是：
命运编剧+导演+女主角！！！ 她会在贝佐斯为亚马逊股价发愁时，开着直升机带他去兜风，用实际行动告诉地球上的女孩们：想征服造火箭的男人，你得先会开飞机！ 这种“能上九天揽月，能下五洋捉鳖”的全能型选手，哪个男人能拒绝？ [抓狂R][抓狂R][石化R][暗中观察R]
55岁的年纪，硬是练出了让20岁少女都羡慕的直角肩、马甲线、紧致手臂……
从普通女孩到全球瞩目的贝佐斯太太，桑切斯用实际行动证明年龄不是限制，55岁照样能把人生过成爽文。 而她背后的逆袭故事，更是给所有女性上了一堂生动的人生课！ 愿我们都能像桑切斯一样，在岁月的长河中，活成自己的女王。 [庆祝R][庆祝R]

cleaned_transcript: SPR_COMBO[zh]当61岁的亚马逊创始人贝佐斯挽着55岁的新娘劳伦·桑切斯走出威尼斯圣乔治马焦雷岛教堂时，全世界都听到了金钱落地的声音。 这场持续三天的世纪婚礼，豪掷5600万美元（约4亿人民币）！！！ 宾客名单闪瞎眼：随便抽出10位嘉宾，身价总和就超过605亿……名流巨富们坐着私人飞机赶来，把威尼斯运河变成了“全球最贵朋友圈”现场。 新娘手上那枚30克拉订婚钻戒（图三）价值500万美元！ 不过真正让时尚界尖叫的，是桑切斯在婚礼期间上演的“超模级时装秀” 说实在，她穿真的一点不输模特！ Versace的粉色刺绣水晶战袍和Dior白色套裙让她成为了全世界最富有女性之余还体验了一把顶级KOL的角色！ 不过如果你以为桑切斯只是靠“会穿”就锁死了首富那就太草率了，这位姐的逆袭史，简直就是《甄嬛传》叠加《穿Prada的女王》。 出身墨西哥移民家庭，童年穷到睡在外婆打工的车后座。 梦想当空姐翱翔蓝天，却因体重超标被拒。 靠着半工半读的狠劲，硬是拼到了南加州大学的奖学金。 更励志的是，她从小有“阅读障碍症”，看书比开飞机还难。 但姐偏不信邪，用加倍的努力硬刚，最终杀进竞争激烈的电视台，从端茶倒水的助理一路干到出镜记者、主播。 从著名体育主播Rory的情人，到NFL球星托尼·冈萨雷斯的娃他妈，再到好莱坞王牌经纪人帕特里克·怀特塞尔的夫人。 每段关系都是精准跳板，最终在亚马逊电影派对上，她等来了“终极BOSS”贝佐斯。 当两人婚外情被亲哥以20万美元卖给小报时，桑切斯冷静得可怕，发律师声明切割亲情，法院反判哥哥赔25万美元。 果然，能拿下首富的女人，心都是钛合金做的吧！ 不靠嫁人改变命运，她自己就是： 命运编剧+导演+女主角！！！ 她会在贝佐斯为亚马逊股价发愁时，开着直升机带他去兜风，用实际行动告诉地球上的女孩们：想征服造火箭的男人，你得先会开飞机！ 这种“能上九天揽月，能下五洋捉鳖”的全能型选手，哪个男人能拒绝？ [抓狂R][抓狂R][石化R][暗中观察R] 55岁的年纪，硬是练出了让20岁少女都羡慕的直角肩、马甲线、紧致手臂…… 从普通女孩到全球瞩目的贝佐斯太太，桑切斯用实际行动证明年龄不是限制，55岁照样能把人生过成爽文。 而她背后的逆袭故事，更是给所有女性上了一堂生动的人生课！ 愿我们都能像桑切斯一样，在岁月的长河中，活成自己的女王。 [庆祝R][庆祝R]

transcript: Amazon's Prime Day Sale is here with offers on home, electronics, beauty and more. The Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette 30ml is one of the most sought-after fragrances on the online giant's platform - now reduced from £42 to £11.97. Prime members can access the vast majority of the exclusive deals and while a membership costs around £8.99 per month, Amazon is letting shoppers try it free for 30 days. It gets users benefits like unlimited one-day and same-day delivery, Prime Videos, ad-free Prime Music and more. The Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette is Amazon's number one best-seller in the perfume category and with an overwhelming 54,550 global ratings, the fragrance boasts an exquisite blend with top notes of apple and water lily, a heart featuring pink guava and dark chocolate, and a sumptuous base of amber and vanilla. The lovely heart-shaped bottle also features a regal-looking golden bottle cap with amethyst-coloured crystals. Shoppers can also get the same perfume at Boots, which is currently selling  a 100ml bottle for £26,where it's available for next-day delivery with code FREENEXTDAY. Meanwhile, Charlotte Tilbury is offering its "mood-boosting" Love Frequency Perfume Set for £91 instead of £130 - a saving of 30%. Shoppers can get their hands on the brand's woody floral fragrance in both 100ml and 10ml bottles. The light and floral scent has been described as "perfect for daytime" while some loyal fans have called it their "all time favourite", reports Liverpool Echo. One shopper noted: "What sets Vera Wang Princess apart is its versatility. It seamlessly transitions from day to night, making it suitable for various occasions. Whether you're attending a casual outing or a formal event, this fragrance complements any ensemble and leaves a trail of elegance and charm in your wake." A delighted customer shared their experience: "My wife loves this. It smells beautiful, not too strong but the smell lingers for hours/days. A very sweet floral smell, I guarantee everyone will compliment." Another shopper wrote: "Bought this multiple times as my partner can't get enough of it over more expensive perfumes I've bought her. The bottle size is also great." A third customer expressed their newfound adoration for the fragrance, stating: "First time trying this perfume and I love it that much that I bought another one, got big size bottles and well worth it. It's my new favourite scent." Yet, not all feedback was glowing; one customer lamented the perfume's longevity: "Beautiful scent but doesn't last at all, I have to add more on several times during the day. Smells lovely and fresh though." Another shopper was left wanting more from the fragrance's intensity: "Its a nice perfume but the smell is a bit faint, it's a bit too subtle and doesn't last very long. Really need to sniff to figure out the notes." But a satisfied shopper enthused: "It's versatile for any occasion and leaves a lasting impression. A true masterpiece." For those interested in purchasing, Vera Wang's Princess Eau De Toilette is on sale at Amazon. In other deals, LookFantastic is offering a 50% discount on Versace's Woman Eau de Parfum 50ml, now £33 down from £66. Additionally, Boots has launched a significant fragrance sale, with some perfumes reduced to half price. READ NEXT

transcript:
SPR_COMBO[zh-tw]萊恩·墨菲新劇《美國愛情故事》聚焦 Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy，再次喚起對這位90年代時尚偶像的關注。 她的風格不只定義了極簡美學，也見證了名人引領時尚的新時代。 2025年6月萊恩墨菲（Ryan Murphy）的《美國愛情故事》（American Love Story）釋出前導，這部以Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy為主角的影集，也讓這位一代時尚偶像的風格再度躍上時尚媒體版面。 而這或許正是影劇的力量，好萊塢總有點石成金的魔法，當時光倒轉到Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy引領風潮的90年代，她的崛起似乎也映照了當時的時尚氛圍，名人開始成為時尚靈感的核心，打破了超模的獨霸地位，時尚產業也就此迎來了一輪影響至今的革新，精品世界的輪廓也正式從名流世界走入了大眾視野。 告別超模時代之後
 90 年代初的時尚界被譽為超模世代，以Linda Evangelista、Cindy Crawford、Christy Turlington、Naomi Campbell以及Tatjana Patitz為首的「The Big Five」等一眾超模引領時尚圈。 不過當全球經濟進入衰退，極簡和街頭Grunge風格崛起，這股超模狂潮最終在90年代中期劃下句點，時尚圈也就此邁向全新時代。 1996年葛妮絲派特洛 Gwyneth Paltrow登上美國版Vogue八月號封面，儘管並非第一位登上封面的好萊塢女星，但事業起步之際即成為封面人物，加上內頁一張與時任男友布萊德彼特的親密合照，事業、愛情雙收的故事激起了大眾的好奇帶動了銷售，也為時尚雜誌的發展帶來轉捩點。 在那個演員與模特兒分眾明顯的年代，Vogue率先從時尚既定印象中解脫，透過名人創造了一條與大眾溝通的全新道路，讓時尚不再那麼遙不可及。 「在1990年代之前，所有領域似乎各自獨立，拍電影的人就拍電影，不會跟時尚人士往來。」 導演貝茲魯曼Baz Luhrmann回憶起當年的場景，提到藝術與時尚在90年代開始聚合。 1996年他的電影《羅密歐與茱麗葉：後現代激情篇》（Romeo + Juliet），便找來Dolce & Gabbana、Prada 和 Yves Saint Laurent打造戲服，讓李奧納多·狄卡皮歐及克萊兒·丹妮絲，用新世代的時尚語言詮釋經典；隔年，Jean Paul Gaultier為盧貝松的科幻巨作《第五元素》（The Fifth Element）設計一系列的戲服，其前衛且充滿未來感的設計，讓電影化身成一場極具風格的時尚狂想。 改變紅毯文化的禮服
 在作品之外，90年代初期影星們刻意輕鬆著裝，顯示自己演員專業的氛圍也慢慢瓦解。 1994年，Elizabeth Hurley穿上Versace安全別針洋裝現身電影《妳是我今生的新娘》的新娘首映，在當年相對大膽的造型攻佔媒體版面讓Versace一夕聲名大噪；1995年烏瑪舒曼Uma Thurman的薰衣草色雪紡禮服，也給了Prada全球性的舞台，讓品牌成為當時時尚圈的夢幻逸品。 當義大利品牌們積極與影星合作擴大影響力，法國品牌們也終於走出高級訂製的名流圈層，1997年妮可基嫚Nicole Kidman身著彼時剛上任Dior創意總監的John Galliano 刺繡高訂禮服出席奧斯卡頒獎典禮，這條被譽為改變好萊塢紅毯進程的裙子在隔日成為各大新聞的焦點，也讓影人們真正迎向與品牌合作的紅毯時代。 至此，奢侈品品牌們紛紛成立名人訂製部門替明星們著裝，名人們的商業潛力也讓時尚產業開啟了全新面貌，而以上三件禮服的重要性，也從它們各自擁有專屬的維基百科頁面不言而喻。 影劇驅動時尚大眾化
 提到時尚大眾化便不得不提1998年首播的《慾望城市》，當第三季主角凱莉對著歹徒說「It's not a bag, it's a Baguette」後來的故事大家都知道了，Fendi的Baguette包意外成了影視經典，也改變了這部劇的命運。 在那個電視劇被認為無法匹敵電影的年代，奢侈品大牌進駐讓《慾望城市》開啟了精品大門，品牌爭相合作也讓時尚走進大眾的茶餘飯後。 兩千年代的影劇也在這樣的氛圍下，創造出《花邊教主》、《穿著Prada的惡魔》、《購物狂的異想世界》等帶動時尚熱度的作品。 當片中的服飾成為大眾討論的話題，影劇角色成為品牌的非官方代言人，造型師與設計師的名字也透過流行文化走進觀眾的日常語彙。 不過當時間推進到近代，儘管仍有像《艾蜜莉在巴黎》這樣有著過往時尚影劇影子的作品，但在整體影視產業更加強調寫實敘寫的環境之下，《王冠》精準復刻皇室穿搭、《高校十八禁》的美式高校、《繼承之戰》掀起的靜奢狂潮，又或是Jonathan Anderson一手打造的《挑戰者》網球世界，戲服忠實呈現某個圈層或場域，當代影劇時尚與大眾的關係，也由戲服移轉至更具媒體曝光度的戰場——紅毯。 過去幾年「Method Dressing方法著裝」儼然成了電影宣傳的行銷賣點，電影公司們加大力度投資影星們主題式的紅毯造型：Margot Robbie的芭比套裝、Zendaya的末世沙丘風格禮服、Cynthia Erivo和Ariana Grande長達一整年的《Wicked》雙色女巫穿搭，時尚品牌和好萊塢傾足全力在這個社群世代，用唯有好萊塢才有的方式展示時尚的不同面向。

Baguette」後來的故事大家都知道了，Fendi的Baguette包意外成了影視經典，也改變了這部劇的命運。 在那個電視劇被認為無法匹敵電影的年代，奢侈品大牌進駐讓《慾望城市》開啟了精品大門，品牌爭相合作也讓時尚走進大眾的茶餘飯後。 兩千年代的影劇也在這樣的氛圍下，創造出《花邊教主》、《穿著Prada的惡魔》、《購物狂的異想世界》等帶動時尚熱度的作品。 當片中的服飾成為大眾討論的話題，影劇角色成為品牌的非官方代言人，造型師與設計師的名字也透過流行文化走進觀眾的日常語彙。 不過當時間推進到近代，儘管仍有像《艾蜜莉在巴黎》這樣有著過往時尚影劇影子的作品，但在整體影視產業更加強調寫實敘寫的環境之下，《王冠》精準復刻皇室穿搭、《高校十八禁》的美式高校、《繼承之戰》掀起的靜奢狂潮，又或是Jonathan Anderson一手打造的《挑戰者》網球世界，戲服忠實呈現某個圈層或場域，當代影劇時尚與大眾的關係，也由戲服移轉至更具媒體曝光度的戰場——紅毯。 過去幾年「Method Dressing方法著裝」儼然成了電影宣傳的行銷賣點，電影公司們加大力度投資影星們主題式的紅毯造型：Margot Robbie的芭比套裝、Zendaya的末世沙丘風格禮服、Cynthia Erivo和Ariana Grande長達一整年的《Wicked》雙色女巫穿搭，時尚品牌和好萊塢傾足全力在這個社群世代，用唯有好萊塢才有的方式展示時尚的不同面向。

transcript: Miami vibes e qualche consiglio per voi: 🚗 Noleggiate una macchina! Noi l'abbiamo presa in aeroporto con Dollar ed è stato super comodo. 🌴 Vi consiglio di fermarvi almeno 2 notti a Miami centro (noi siamo stati allo smartbrickellhotel ) e poi magari altre 2-3 notti zona Miami Beach. Evitate di dormire troppo vicino an Ocean Drive, di sera è parecchio rumorosa. 🍸 Un rooftop elegante che mi è piaciuto tanto: Sugar, in centro. 🪩 Di sera Miami Beach può sembrare un po' pacchiana e “too much” (almeno per me 😅). Preferisco la zona vicino a Bayfront Park o Brickell City Center. 🥥 Di giorno però Miami Beach ha vibes bellissime: spiagge enormi e le famose casette colorate dei bagnini! Se potete, fate un salto anche a Key Biscayne per il mare. 🌊 L'acqua è stupenda, ma occhio ad andare troppo al largo: noi ci siamo ritrovati uno squalo a riva 😂 🍔 Prendete un hamburger da burgermeistermiami e mangiatelo sulla spiaggia. 🎇 Se riuscite, veniteci per il 4 luglio: fuochi d'artificio sulla spiaggia, un'atmosfera incredibile. 🥗 Per un pranzo più healthy vi consiglio puravidamiami o wholefoods 🌩️ Se capitate in bassa stagione come noi, aspettatevi qualche pioggia: durano pochissimo e vi godrete comunque mare e città. 🇨🇺 Da Little Havana mi aspettavo un po' di più, ma fermatevi in un locale con musica cubana e provate un sandwich cubano. 🚇 Prendete il Metromover (gratuito!) per fare un giro del centro, merita. 🏙️ La zona che ho amato di più è la Miami Riverwalk: elegante, grattacieli nuovi e yacht ovunque che passano ogni due secondi, bellissima davvero! 🦎 Ah, ci sono animali strani in giro… è normale! 😂 🌅 Il tramonto rosa su Miami Beach? Pazzesco. 🍝 Se vi va, provate la Versace Mansion a pranzo (la sera è un po' troppo turistica): prezzi alti, ma posto elegante e cucina buonissima, perfettamente in linea con lo stile Versace. 🖤 godetevela e rilassatevi, non programmate tutto per filo e per segno, “lasciatevi andare”, Miami è anche questo✨ Voi ci siete già stati? Vi è piaciuta? 🤍 #miami #guidamiami

transcript: SPR_COMBO[ru]09 июля17:56Лорен Санчес и Джефф Безос. Фото: Через неделю после «свадьбы года» 55-летнюю Лорен Санчес в Париже подловили папарацци — снимки опубликовал Daily Mail. Жена Джеффа Безоса, вероятно, прилетела на Неделю моды, и в прошлый вечер встретилась с подругой — моделью Брукс Надер. На ужин журналистка надела алое латексное платье от Versace с провокационным декольте и в руках несла сумку Hermès Kelly из крокодиловой кожи. Это первый выход Санчес в свет в новом статусе супруги миллиардера. Лорен Санчес. Фото: BackGrid Лорен Санчес. Фото: BackGrid Трёхдневное торжество окрестили «свадьбой века» ещё до того, как стали известны даты. Подготовка сопровождалась скандалом. Жители Венеции взбунтовались, когда узнали, где Безос и Санчес устроят праздник — активисты выступили под лозунгом: «Если для своей свадьбы вы можете позволить себе взять в аренду Венецию, вы явно могли бы платить побольше налогов». Впрочем, по подсчётам экспертов, город неплохо заработал на свадьбе основателя Amazon. Санчес и Безос познакомились в 2016 году и сошлись якобы благодаря общим интересам. У журналистки есть права пилота, также она основала компанию, которая занимается аэросъёмкой. В 2018 году она сотрудничала с аэрокосмической компанией Безоса. В 2019 году пара объявила об отношениях — незадолго до этого миллиардер расстался с первой женой. Предложение бизнесмен сделал во время поездки по Франции в 2023 году. Ссылка

transcript: Richmond outlet mall has welcomed brands such as Under Armour, Zwilling and Karl Lagerfeld for their first stores in the region Ten years after its launch on July 9, 2015, the McArthurGlen Outlet Vancouver Airport is bustling with shoppers, and its executives say they plan to expand the region's only outlet centre. It is a testament that retail success can come when developers target a clear niche and there is unmet demand in the market. “We're working through permitting and some leasing right now, and we'll have an opening date announcement of Phase 3 in the next couple of months,” said Robert Thurlow, general manager of what is largely a mall with tenants that sell off-price merchandise. His expected 63,000-square-foot expansion would enlarge the Richmond mall to approximately 387,000 square feet of leasable space. An expansion has been in the works for years. The mall was a success from day one. Mall executives back then counted about 160,000 shoppers in the mall's first four days, and traffic jams on roads leading to the complex disrupted vehicle flow for those heading to the nearby Vancouver International Airport. Months later it won an award for being the world's best outlet centre. The mall initially had about 240,000 square feet of leasable space, of which 156,000 square feet was leased on opening day. Within three years, the mall had filled about 96 per cent of that space with tenants, Thurlow told BIV. An 84,000-square-foot Phase 2 expansion opened toward the southeast in 2019, and Thurlow said Phase 3 is set to add another 63,000 square feet to the northeast of the original mall footprint. Fueling the expansion is retail success. Thurlow pinned the mall retailers' average annual sales per square foot at about $1,350. The mall does not take part in the International Council of Shopping Centers' (ICSC) annual ranking of Canadian shopping centres by that metric. If it had done so, it would have last year ranked No. 5 in Canada, and No. 3 in B.C., behind CF Pacific Centre's $1,454 per square foot, and CF Richmond Centre's $1,359 per square foot on the ICSC rankings. “McArthurGlen is an extremely well-performing shopping centre,” Retail Insider owner and consultant Craig Patterson told BIV. “It's got a value proposition to it. It's a mall that has stores that are known to have lower prices, and it has got a compelling mix of brands. People will line up for certain brands that are on sale, and McArthurGlen has a good number of those brands.” The mall's largest retail tenant is Ralph Lauren, which leases about 20,000 square feet, according to Thurlow. That location is Ralph Lauren's first outlet location in Metro Vancouver, he said. The clothing chain has had other full-price stores in the region but never a store that carried off-price merchandise such as out-of-season clothing or products specifically made for an outlet store, according to Thurlow. Brands that opened their first-ever store in the region – full price or outlet – at the McArthurGlen Outlet Vancouver Airport mall include Under Armour, Zwilling and Karl Lagerfeld, Thurlow said. The first Marc Jacobs outlet store in Western Canada opened at the mall earlier this year, he added. His mall caters to a wide range of tastes and price ranges, with Versace being a luxury store that has its only store in Metro Vancouver at the mall. To mark the 10th anniversary, the mall has encouraged tenants to offer special discounts. Mall management has also arranged for live music, special events and contests with prizes, such as a round-trip Helijet excursion to Victoria to stay two nights at the Fairmont Empress hotel. [email protected] twitter.com/GlenKorstrom Bluesky.com/glenkorstrom.bsky.social

transcript: SPR_COMBO[pl]CNBC przypomina, że sprzedaż akcji Amazona przez Bezosa jest częścią planu ogłoszonego na początku tego roku, zgodnie z którym miliarder sprzeda do 25 mln akcji Amazona do maja 2026 r. Czytaj też: Platforma X bez prezesa. Współpracowniczka Elona Muska złożyła rezygnację Założyciel Amazona, mimo rezygnacji z funkcji prezesa firmy w 2021 r., nadal posiada ponad 900 mln akcji Amazon, wycenianych na blisko 200 mld dol. Ślub Jeffa Bezosa i Lauren Sanchez. Wenecja zarobiła miliony euro Wenecja częściowo opustoszała, a strategiczne punkty w rejonie najbardziej luksusowych hoteli, gdzie zatrzymała się amerykańska para i jej goście, przestały być strefami nadzwyczajnych środków bezpieczeństwa. Wokół nich przez kilka dni gromadziły się dziesiątki paparazzi i wysłanników mediów, którzy podążali na motorówkach za uczestnikami ceremonii — taki był obraz Wenecji w trakcie ślubu miliardera i założyciela Amazona Jeffa Bezosa z byłą amerykańską dziennikarką Lauren Sanchez. Czytaj także w BUSINESS INSIDER Czytaj też: Nvidia: pierwsza spółka z wartością rynkową 4 bilionów dolarów Bezos i Sanchez, których ślub odbył się w piątek, wyjechali z Wenecji w niedzielne popołudnie po całej serii przyjęć i hucznych obchodów w kilku punktach miasta. Ostatnia ceremonia odbyła się w Arsenale i według mediów było to "pidżama party" pod hasłem Dolce Notte (słodka noc). Gośćmi amerykańskiej pary byli między innymi córka prezydenta USA Donalda Trumpa— Ivanka Trump z mężem Jaredem Kushnerem, królowa Jordanii Rania, Bill Gates, Steven Spielberg, Leonardo DiCaprio z partnerką Vittorią Ceretti, Orlando Bloom, Kim Kardashian z rodziną, Oprah Winfrey, Donatella Versace. Obecności Bezosa i Sanchez w Wenecji towarzyszyły protesty przeciwników organizacji ich ślubu w mieście i wynajmowania jego części na takie uroczystości. Akcje te skrytykowały lokalne władze, argumentując, że to wielka szansa dla tego historycznego miasta. Według Ministerstwa Turystyki Włoch to wydarzenie o globalnym zasięgu oznacza wpływ gospodarczy dla Wenecji szacowany na ponad 950 mln euro.

Obecności Bezosa i Sanchez w Wenecji towarzyszyły protesty przeciwników organizacji ich ślubu w mieście i wynajmowania jego części na takie uroczystości. Akcje te skrytykowały lokalne władze, argumentując, że to wielka szansa dla tego historycznego miasta. Według Ministerstwa Turystyki Włoch to wydarzenie o globalnym zasięgu oznacza wpływ gospodarczy dla Wenecji szacowany na ponad 950 mln euro.
reasoning: - The text mentions Donatella Versace only as one of many guests at Jeff Bezos's wedding in Venice

transcript: SPR_COMBO[el]Η Λόρεν Σάντσεζ πραγματοποίησε μία εντυπωσιακή εμφάνιση με κόκκινο, σέξι φόρεμα στο Παρίσι, χωρίς τον σύζυγό της Τζεφ Μπέζος. Ήταν η πρώτη δημόσια εμφάνιση της Λόρεν Σάντσεζ μετά τον πολυσυζητημένο γάμο της με τον δισεκατομμυριούχο ιδρυτή της Amazon, Τζεφ Μπέζος, που έγινε τον περασμένο μήνα στην Ιταλία με κόστος 50 εκατομμυρίων δολαρίων. Το τριήμερο πάρτι γάμου φιλοξένησε 200 εκλεκτούς καλεσμένους και χαρακτηρίστηκε από πολλούς ως «Ο Γάμος του Αιώνα». Το βράδυ της Τρίτης, η Λ.Σάντσεζ εμφανίστηκε χωρίς τον Μπέζος στο Παρίσι, όπου δείπνησε στο κομψό εστιατόριο Laperouse με τον βραβευμένο με Όσκαρ ηθοποιό Λεονάρντο Ντι Κάπριο, τον επίσης βραβευμένο Σον Πεν, το μοντέλο Μπρουκς Νέιντερ και άλλες διασημότητες. Η 55χρονη κυρία Μπέζος προκάλεσε αναστάτωση κατά την άφιξή της, φορώντας ένα εντυπωσιακό κόκκινο φόρεμα από λάτεξ του οίκου Versace, αξίας πάνω από 3.500 δολάρια, το οποίο τόνιζε το πλούσιο μπούστο της. Το λουκ ολοκληρώθηκε με μαύρη τσάντα Hermès Kelly από δέρμα κροκόδειλου. Σύμφωνα με δημοσιεύματα, ο Ντι Κάπριο ντυμένος στα μαύρα, με καπέλο, αποχώρησε από το εστιατόριο πριν τη Σάντσεζ και τη Νέιντερ, συνοδευόμενος μόνο από έναν σωματοφύλακα. Ο 64χρονος Σον Πεν έφτασε συνοδευόμενος από την εντυπωσιακή 30χρονη σύντροφό του, Βαλέρια Νίκοβ. Η απουσία του Τ.Μπέζος πιθανότατα οφείλεται σε επαγγελματικές υποχρεώσεις, καθώς αναμένεται να παρευρεθεί στο ετήσιο συνέδριο ηγετών της Allen & Co. στο Σαν Βάλεϊ του Αϊντάχο αυτή την εβδομάδα.

transcript: Numerator's research on the first two days of the event found that 30 percent of shoppers are clicking on apparel or footwear, tying with household essentials. Amazon's mini Christmas in July has consumers clicking on fashion — and there are more apparel brands in the promotional mix, including vintage designer style from ReBag as well as looks from Michael Kors, Naadam and more. Prime Day, which extended to four days this year and ends on Friday, has become a fixture on the retail calendar, prompting competing deals from other retailers. Altogether, retailers are expected to see $23.8 billion in sales, or the equivalent of two Black Fridays, according to Adobe. At Amazon, the event has had a strong fashion start. Numerator is tracking the e-commerce giant's Prime Day take, studying the activity of shoppers at 22,411 households and surveying 2,248 buyers during the sale's first two days. Thirty percent of buyers snatched up Prime Day apparel and footwear — tying for the top spot with cleaning products and other household essentials, according to the data and tech company. But in keeping with the general sense of caution in the market, consumers are being very calculated as they spend. Fifty-one percent of shoppers bought items that they'd been waiting to buy on sale and 37 percent of shoppers bought the same items they typically buy on Amazon. Numerator pegged the average order size on Prime Day at $57.12 and said 51 percent of households have made two or more orders, upping the average household spend to $126.26. Two-thirds of the Prime Day items have sold for under $20 while only 3 percent are over $100. Amazon has been steadily adding to its fashion mix and a company spokesperson pointed to the slate of fashions making their Prime Day debut. For the first time, the luxury resale player Rebag is offering price promotions on looks from Alexander McQueen, Chloé, Delvaux, Givenchy, Jacquemus, Valentino Garavani, Versace and Tom Ford on Amazon. And a host of brands have joined the rush this year and included select items in the event, such as Hervé Léger, Kate Barton, Calzedonia, Vans, Michael Kors and Naadam.

transcript: Newlywed Lauren Sánchez-Bezos has made her first public appearance since her lavish Venetian wedding to Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, and she did so in unforgettable style. Stepping out in Paris for dinner with model Brooks Nader and her sister, Sarah Jane Nader, Sánchez stunned in a striking red latex dress by Versace. The eye-catching gown, retailing for around £2,700 ($3,515), featured a corset bodice that accentuated her curves, a ruched skirt, and a hemline just above the knee. Paired with strappy black heels and her signature confidence, the look turned heads across the City of Light. The dinner took place at the luxurious Laperouse restaurant after Sánchez was seen leaving the historic Hôtel de Crillon. Paris served as the perfect backdrop for her glamorous return, especially with the city buzzing for Haute Couture Week, running from 7 to 10 July. The evening marked Sánchez's first public sighting since her whirlwind wedding celebrations in Venice just last month. She and Bezos tied the knot in a multi-day extravaganza attended by 200 close friends and family. The guest list was star-studded, featuring Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, Kris Jenner, and Bill Gates. Ellie Goulding performed at the reception, and Usher entertained guests at a playful pyjama-themed brunch the following day. For the ceremony, Sánchez wore a breathtaking Dolce & Gabbana lace gown inspired by screen legend Sophia Loren. The gown, featuring a high neck, long sleeves, and a sweeping veil, reportedly took over 900 hours to create in the atelier. She complemented it with a flared skirt and an intricately buttoned waist, embodying timeless elegance and cinematic glamour. During other events across the multi-day celebration, she showcased her bold sense of style: a gold corseted Schiaparelli couture dress at the welcome dinner and a rose-pink atelier Versace gown adorned with Swarovski crystals at their 'Dolce Notte' party. Each look highlighted her confident and sensual aesthetic, perfectly balancing drama and sophistication. Her return to Paris carries special meaning. The city hosted her unforgettable bachelorette festivities, where she celebrated with friends in a series of sheer and lacy looks that foreshadowed her bridal style. The recent red Versace ensemble echoed this playful spirit, capturing her fearless approach to fashion while marking a new chapter as a newlywed. The ensemble was completed with a black crocodile Hermès Kelly bag — estimated to be worth over £39,000 ($50,000) — and her hair worn sleek and straight for a polished finish. While Sánchez enjoyed her stylish evening in Paris, Bezos was expected to attend Allen & Co.'s annual leadership retreat in Sun Valley, a private gathering known for attracting influential figures from the worlds of tech and business. Lauren Sánchez Bezos has shown that her post-wedding glow extends far beyond romance, radiating through her bold fashion choices and undeniable confidence. Her striking Paris appearance blends glamour, sophistication, and a hint of nostalgia — a true celebration of love, style, and self-expression.

transcript: Article created by: Gabija Saveiskyte  These boots were made for walking, and those gloves were made for grabbing all the lemons life may throw at you at any given time. Lamps, paintings, handbags, and much more that we humans are capable of creating with just a little bit of inspiration and a whole lot of sweat-inducing work. Regardless of the outcome, handmade goods are always to be celebrated. They're unique, and mayhaps sometimes imperfect, but that's all the more reason to be proud of what you've made. And today, to give you some inspiration and induce an 'awe' or two, we'll be looking at the most recent posts from the r/somethingimade subreddit. We reached out to the moderators of the page and one of them, named u/mtj510, was kind enough to answer a few of our questions, so make sure you stick around for that! Make sure to upvote your favorites as you're scrolling through, leave some comments along the way and tell us the most creative thing you've ever made, maybe even share links—we're curious, alright! And if you're craving a little more, Bored Panda has you covered with an article right here . Now let's get into it! transcript: She paired the metallic heels with a beaded Loewe dress. Vanessa Kirby stepped into shine and structure for Thursday's London premiere of “The Fantastic Four: First Steps,” wearing Aquazzura's Minute Sandal 105 in metallic silver — the latest entry in her sculptural maternity footwear streak.QUES The Italian-made stilettos featured mirrored leather uppers, two slim straps and a high, tapered heel. A back zip created a clean finish at the ankle, and the brand's signature gold plaque was visible on the sole. The 105mm silhouette added lift without disrupting the overall proportion. Related Stories Kirby paired the sandals with a beaded turquoise dress from Loewe's spring 2025 collection. The strapless midi-length look, styled by Andrew Mukamal, was constructed entirely of layered bead strands that created fringe-like movement across the body. The runway version featured a shorter hemline and metallic underlayer, but Kirby's custom iteration removed any lining to emphasize the vertical drape. Combined with the clean stiletto, the full look felt visually elongated. This marked Kirby's latest footwear-forward look on the “Fantastic Four: First Steps” press tour. Earlier this week in Paris, she wore metallic wraparound stilettos with a lilac Givenchy halter dress. In Mexico, she styled two different Manolo Blahnik silhouettes — including the black snakeskin Paloma heel — with cutout knits and a teal Schiaparelli gown. And at the Alabama trailer launch in February, she wore pointed PVC stilettos with vintage Versace. Across each appearance, Kirby has relied on heels with clean lines and exaggerated finishes — think eye-catching metallics, sheer panels and snakeskin — to ground dresses that range from architectural to body-conscious. “The Fantastic Four: First Steps” marks the Marvel franchise's official reboot under Disney, introducing a new cast led by Kirby, Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn and Ebon Moss-Bachrach. Directed by Matt Shakman, the film serves as both an origin story and launchpad for the characters' integration into the broader MCU, ahead of their expected crossover appearances in “Avengers: Secret Wars.” The film opens in U.S. theaters on July 25. Read More

transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]El 'Pretty boy” vuelve ser tendencia a pocos días de haber sido visto en Cartagena bailando junto a la modelo Ariadna Gutiérrez en medio de la grabación del videoclip de su más reciente sencillo llamado 'Bronceador'. ","type":"text Ahora Maluma está dando de qué hablar luego de que subiera un particular video a sus redes sociales en el que confesaba que por primera vez había tenido que usar un servicio de Uber para llegar a un compromiso. ","type":"text A pocas horas de subir la historia en su cuenta de Instagram, sus seguidores comentaron la publicación con divertidos mensajes, entre ellos “siempre hay una primera vez para todo”, “muy humilde”, “qué Uber tan bendecido”. ","type":"text ","type":"text Pero el verdadero detalle que muchos usuarios no dejaron pasar fue el objeto con el que viajó el cantante en el carro, al subirse con una lujosa maleta Louis Vuitton, modelo Horizon 50, de la colaboración con el artista Takashi Murakami, valorada en alrededor de 4.500 dólares es decir más de 18 millones de pesos colombianos. ","type":"text La exclusiva maleta hace parte de las colaboraciones artísticas de la marca francesa. Una de las primeras fue en 2002 con el artista japonés Takashi Murakami. ","type":"text Bajo la dirección creativa de Marc Jacobs, Murakami reinterpretó el monograma clásico de la marca usando hasta 33 colores sobre fondo blanco o negro, dando origen a la icónica línea Monogram Multicolore, un éxito comercial que se convirtió en símbolo pop-cultural. ","type":"text Esta fusión entre arte y moda generó piezas memorables como los bolsos Speedy, Keepall, y los imaginativos diseños Cherry Blossom y Monogramouflage, que integraban flores sonrientes y patrones geométricos. ","type":"text La colaboración original se prolongó hasta 2015, y debido a su relevancia y demanda, Louis Vuitton relanzó esta colección en 2025 mediante una reedición en dos fases, revitalizando los clásicos bajo una estética moderna y vibrante. ","type":"text ","type":"text No es sorpresa que Maluma use ese tipo de prendas. En la Met Gala 2021, el cantante paisa sorprendió con un traje de inspiración western firmado por Versace, completamente bordado en cristales y con chaqueta de flecos. ","type":"text ","type":"text También ha lucido creaciones de diseñadores como Balmain, Prada y Valentino. Durante la Met Gala de este año el antioqueño usó un impresionante traje zoot suit bordado en azul medianoche y verde esmeralda, diseñado por Willy Chavarría. ","type":"text El estilismo incluyó un sombrero bolero con rosas, una cadena de reloj y un reloj de lujo valorado en 5 millones de dólares, fabricado por Jacob & Co. con casi 150 quilates de esmeraldas colombianas. ","type":"text ","type":"text ","type"

Nicolas Sarkozy estaba recién separado de Cécilia Ciganer Albéniz, que se había marchado a Nueva York con Richard Attias, y se enamoró perdidamente de la modelo y cantante. transcript: It's a brand the Princess of Wales had enjoyed earlier in her royal life. Rachel Burchfield is the contributing royals editor at InStyle, where she covers news about the British royal family on a daily basis, including the work and wardrobes of Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle. Close Princess Diana on June 17, 1997. Credit: Getty Though Princess Diana wore Chanel tweed suits earlier in her royal life, in her later years—and especially after her 1996 divorce—she found it difficult to wear Chanel for the most heartbreaking reason. The brand's interlocked Cs iconic logo reminded her too much of Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles—whose affair dominated much of Diana's 15-year marriage to Charles. As Diana herself said in a 1995 interview, there were three people in her marriage, so it was a bit crowded. In the final years of her life, Princess Diana was a fan of many designer labels—think Versace and Dior, for starters—but one fashion house she avoided? Chanel—and for the most heartbreaking reason. It's not because she wasn't a fan of their clothes—it boiled down to her husband Prince Charles's longstanding affair with Camilla Parker Bowles, an affair that had plagued much of their marriage. Chanel, of course, is known for its interlocking Cs—and this reminded the Princess of Wales too much of Charles and Camilla. Because of Chanel's iconic logo, Diana “could no longer bring herself” to wear the brand, People reported. Princess Diana wearing Chanel earlier in her royal life. Getty After marrying in 1981, Charles and Diana separated in 1992 and finalized their divorce in 1996—just one year before her untimely death. Though she had worn Chanel tweed suits early in her royal life, after her divorce, Diana couldn't wear Chanel because, as Australian designer Jayson Brundson told Harper's Bazaar, “She said, 'No, I can't wear linked Cs, the double C.” Brundson styled Diana for a hospital charity event during what would ultimately become her last visit Down Under in 1996. After choosing a pair of Chanel shoes to compliment her cream Versace skirt suit, Diana demurred at wearing them. “I asked why, and she said, 'It's Camilla and Charles,'” Brundson recalled. Princess Diana in Sydney, Australia on November 1, 1996. Getty Princess Diana in Versace on October 31, 1996 in Sydney, Australia. Getty “It was definitely the timing, it being post-divorce,” he continued. “She would have seen linked Cs, and they would have just reminded her of Charles and Camilla. The shoes were quite boldly Chanel—I think they had gold linked Cs on them. And I think for photo optics, people would have honed in on that considering it was so fresh after the divorce, as well.” Adding insult to injury, during her marriage to Charles, Diana found a pair of cufflinks Charles owned engraved with interlocked Cs—which she interpreted as an homage to Charles and Camilla. “It's hard to believe that anyone as intelligent and well-read as the Prince of Wales could be so stupid—so utterly incapable of imagining what a new wife might conclude if her husband carried a photograph of his old girlfriend in his diary,” royal biographer Penny Junor wrote in her biography of Camilla called The Duchess: The Untold Story. Princess Diana in Chanel earlier in her royal life. Getty Speaking to Andrew Morton for his bombshell 1992 biography about her called Diana: Her True Story, Diana recalled Charles sending Camilla flowers with a signed card reading “To Gladys from Fred”—their nicknames for one another. “[I met her] very early on,” Diana said of Camilla (via People). “I was introduced to the circle, but obviously I was a threat. I was a very young girl, but I was a threat. We always had discussions about Camilla, though. I once heard him on the telephone in his bath on his handheld set saying, 'Whatever happens, I will always love you.' I told him afterwards that I had listened at the door, and we had a filthy row.” About two weeks before their wedding on July 29, 1981, someone in Charles's office told Diana that he had a bracelet made for Camilla with “G” and “F” (for Gladys and Fred) intertwined on it. “I was devastated,” Diana said. Prince Charles and Lady Diana Spencer after their wedding ceremony at St. Paul's Cathedral on July 29, 1981. / Fox Photos / Hulton Archive “So I had lunch with my sisters and said, 'I can't marry him, I can't do this, this is absolutely unbelievable,'” Diana recalled. “They were wonderful and said, 'Well, bad luck Duch [Diana's childhood nickname], your face is on the tea towels, so you're too late to chicken out.' So we made light of it.” Diana added that, on their honeymoon, she noticed cufflinks on her husband's wrists—“Two Cs entwined like the Chanel Cs,” she said. “Got it in one; knew exactly. ' Camilla gave you those, didn't she?'...

transcript: SPR_COMBO[vi]Theo PageSix, Jeff Bezos và Lauren Sánchez vừa có màn tái xuất ấn tượng tại hội nghị kín ở Sun Valley, Idaho (Mỹ) – nơi được mệnh danh là “trại hè tỷ phú.” Cặp đôi không rời nhau nửa bước, xuất hiện nổi bật giữa dàn khách mời quyền lực. Lauren Sánchez khoe vẻ ngoài rạng rỡ với bảng tên ghi họ mới – Lauren Sánchez Bezos. Cô diện áo tank top đen, quần trắng, kính râm cổ điển, hoa tai kim cương, thắt lưng đen bản nhỏ và chiếc túi Hermès Kelly da cá sấu hiếm có. Trong khi đó, tỷ phú Amazon Jeff Bezos chọn phong cách đơn giản với áo thun xám, quần jeans và kính râm phi công. Cả hai không ngần ngại thể hiện tình cảm trước công chúng, thu hút mọi ống kính khi vừa xuất hiện. Sự kiện Sun Valley do Allen & Company tổ chức từ năm 1983, mỗi năm quy tụ các ông lớn ngành công nghệ, truyền thông, tài chính. Danh sách khách mời năm nay có những cái tên đình đám như Mark Zuckerberg, Tim Cook, Gayle King, Ivanka Trump, Wendi Murdoch. Các chủ đề thảo luận tập trung vào tác động mạnh mẽ của trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI) đối với các ngành công nghiệp toàn cầu. Trước đó, Lauren Sánchez cũng gây chú ý khi dự tiệc cùng bạn thân Brooks Nader tại Paris, diện váy đỏ ôm sát gợi cảm của Versace. Hai tuần trước, Jeff Bezos và Lauren Sánchez vừa tổ chức lễ cưới hoành tráng tại Venice, Ý, trên đảo San Giorgio Maggiore. Sự kiện quy tụ loạt sao hạng A như Leonardo DiCaprio, Oprah Winfrey, Orlando Bloom, Kim Kardashian. Ông Luca Zaia, Chủ tịch vùng Veneto, ước tính tổng chi phí lễ cưới và các hoạt động bên lề lên tới 40-48 triệu euro (khoảng 47-56 triệu USD). Tuy được gọi là “đám cưới thế kỷ,” sự kiện cũng gây tranh cãi. Nhiều người dân Venice hoan nghênh, coi đây là dịp quảng bá du lịch, nhưng không ít ý kiến lo ngại thành phố dần biến thành “sân chơi của giới siêu giàu.”

transcript: SPR_COMBO[sq]Vëllë, kjo s'është thjesht modë  është *manifest psikologjik* me ngjyrime trap. **Duam të dukemi sikur jemi “dikushi”**. Nuk na mban më xhepi, na mban logoja. Balenciaga për ne është si diplomë në Harvard. Njerëzit duan të ndihen të rëndësishëm, edhe nëse s'e dinë saktësisht pse. **Estetikë e dominancës**. Kur s'ke ndonjë pozicion të madh në shoqëri, të paktën ngjaj si shef. Sytë e fshehur pas syzeve, mimika zero dhe ecja si të ketë rënë bomba janë mënyra për të thënë: *mos më afro se kam kredi për të paguar*. **Instagrami është psikologu i kombit**. Në vend të ndjekim ëndrrat, ndjekim story-t e atyre që bëjnë “life coaching” me Gucci. Rrobat e markës janë like-at në botën reale. **Inferioritet i paketuar si superioritet**. Në thelb, shumë ndihen jo mjaftueshëm. Po si thuhet kjo shqip? Me Versace me shkëlqim dhe me një borsete që duket sikur fsheh një plan biznesi (por është bosh). **Edukimi estetik: mision i pamundur**. Askush s'na mëson që shija nuk blihet. Po s'ka faj njeri  nëse s'e bën dot artin, bën artificin. Në fund të ditës, vëllë, ndoshta s'është faj i askujt. Duket bukur në TikTok, ndjehesh më “boss” dhe borseta s'të zë shumë vend.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]La actriz interpreta a quien fue la esposa del expresidente y en su personaje refleja la moda de la época. Menem, la serie relata la vida personal de Carlos Saúl Menem como también su paso por la presidencia y su controvertido gobierno, que es recordado hasta el día de hoy. Un personaje clave en la ficción es el que interpreta Griselda Siciliani. La actriz se pone en la piel de Zulema Yoma, quien fue esposa del líder político y es madre de Zulemita y Carlos Menem Jr. Además de su interpretación, la artista muestra los atuendos típicos de la época. Precisamente, 4 looks fueron los que más llamaron la atención de los espectadores. Cuáles son los looks clásicos de los '90 que lleva Griselda Siciliani en Menem, la serie Griselda Siciliani es la encargada de personificar a Zulema Yoma en la nueva serie biográfica de Carlos Sául Menem, que ya se encuentra disponible en Prime Video. Por esta razón, la artista pertenece al reparto principal de la historia junto a Leonardo Sbaraglia, quien hace del expresidente. A lo largo de los seis capítulos, la actriz luce diferentes vestuarios que solía usar Zulema en aquel entonces. Desde piezas sofisticadas a looks más casuales para el día a día. De hecho, uno de ellos está compuesto por una camisa de una reconocida firma, que en los años '90 causaba furor. Se trata de una prenda de seda, diseñada por Gianni Versace, de estilo sofisticado y maximalismo bastante común en aquella época. Además, su corte holgado y fluido refuerza la estética retro y glam que se buscó para recrear esta escena. Otro look que llamó la atención es el tapado de piel que luce Griselda Siciliani en una de las tomas junto a su compañero Leonardo Sbaraglia como Menem. Este abrigo de piel sintética y diseño animal print fue otro ítem típico de la moda noventosa. Su uso reflejaba lujo, poder, estatus y sofisticación en aquellos tiempos y Zulema Yoma lo sabía. Esta pieza encajaba a la perfección con el espíritu de la época: exagerado, llamativo y aspiracional. No solo lo usaban integrantes del entorno familiar del riojano, sino también figuras destacadas del espectáculo argentino. En otra de las escenas, Griselda Sicliani lleva otro look muy representativo de los '90. Se trata de un conjunto deportivo y urbano en color celeste. La campera de corte amplio y estilo vintage con cierre hasta el cuello demuestra que en aquellos tiempos la ropa para hacer deportes formaba parte de la vida cotidiana de la sociedad. Por último, este personaje también lleva un traje elegante que supo ser tendencia. El mismo está compuesto por una chaqueta con botones y una falda de raso texturado con acabado tornasolado en tonalidad celeste. Al mismo lo combinó con una camisa blanca por debajo y unos accesorios dorados. De esta manera, Griselda Siciliani no sólo muestra cómo era la relación de Zulema Yoma con Carlos Saúl Menem, sino que también refleja el estilismo propio de la época y destaca las tendencias que se llevaban en 4 looks en particular. transcript: Vanessa Kirby joined co-star Julia Garner for The Fantastic Four: First Steps London photocall at the Corinthia Hotel this afternoon, giving us another maternity look to file under “cool and considered”. Tim P. Whitby/ for The Walt Disney Company Limited After serving up a series of unexpected silhouettes and colour stories that veered away from her signature minimalist leanings, Vanessa has been a joy to watch on this tour. Every look has felt deliberate, styled to tell a story, and worthy of its moment. So maybe that's why this navy Magda Butrym hooded midi dress felt a little muted in comparison. Adir Abergel There's definitely a vibe. The hood pulled up, paired with her Port Tanger Malick sunglasses, gave it a moody, cinematic edge. Almost The Matrix by way of a fashion editorial. She looked great, no question—but after the visual impact of her Altuzarra, Loewe, Balmain, and Atelier Versace moments, this one felt more understated than expected. Still, it's Vanessa, so the bar is already sky-high. Stylist: Andrew Mukamal. Hair Stylist: Adir Abergel. Makeup Artist: Jo Baker. transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]Belinda protagonizó un momento inolvidable al interpretar “Él me mintió” acompañada nada menos que por Amanda Miguel al piano, durante una proyección especial de Mentiras, la serie en Los Ángeles. El emotivo dueto ocurrió mientras Belinda y el productor Luis Gerardo Méndez recibían una placa de platino por parte de Warner Music, que certifica 100 millones de reproducciones de la banda sonora de la exitosa producción de Prime Video. Beli me da mucha ternura. Es una mujer pero a la vez sigue siendo como esa pequeña de 10 años que veíamos en las telenovelas  pic.twitter.com/WyqFcbjjyr — лорена ️‍ (@M1k1Chan) July 11, 2025 Desde su estreno el pasado 13 de junio, Mentiras, la serie, inspirada en el icónico musical ochentero, se convirtió en un fenómeno en Latinoamérica y Estados Unidos, logrando posicionarse en el Top 5 en 14 países y alcanzando el noveno lugar entre los contenidos más vistos en la historia de la plataforma en México. Gran parte de este éxito se debe a la participación de Belinda, quien da vida a Daniela Levy de Mijares, un personaje lleno de matices que ha conquistado al público tanto por su actuación como por su talento vocal. La artista no solo impresionó con su interpretación de clásicos del pop mexicano, sino que cuidó cada detalle de su personaje, seleccionando personalmente un vestuario de firmas como Versace, Chanel y Hermès, que realzó la elegancia de cada escena. El momento más emotivo de la noche fue cuando, tras interpretar el icónico tema frente a su autora original, Amanda Miguel, la legendaria cantante no pudo contener las lágrimas y le dedicó palabras de admiración. “Cantas precioso, lo hiciste muy bien y apenas estás mostrando lo que verdaderamente puedes hacer”. Belinda, visiblemente emocionada, respondió: “Te amamos, te admiramos y eres la mejor”. La banda sonora de Mentiras ha reavivado el gusto por las baladas románticas de los 80. Solo “Él me mintió” sumó más de 1.8 millones de reproducciones en Spotify en una semana, con un aumento del 94% desde el estreno. Tras la proyección, ambas artistas celebraron este logro con una interpretación íntima que rápidamente se volvió viral, sellando uno de los momentos más memorables para los fans de la nostalgia pop y confirmando a Belinda como una de las figuras más queridas y versátiles del entretenimiento actual.

transcript: The custom look put a spin on the brand's signature underwear set Starr Bowenbank Link copied Parkwood Entertainment;Courtesy of Calvin Klein Beyoncé in Calvin Klein NEED TO KNOW Beyoncé wore a custom Calvin Klein look for her Cowboy Carter Tour stop in Maryland The singer's look consisted of the brand's signature logo bralette and high-waisted panty but was embroidered with thousands of crystal beads The entire outfit took nearly 250 hours to make Beyoncé is no stranger to a custom stage look, but one of the pop star's latest tour outfits put a very glamorous spin on an iconic underwear set. The "Texas Hold 'Em" singer, 43, took her Cowboy Carter Tour to the Northwest Stadium in Landover, Md., on July 7 and unveiled a brand new look, courtesy of Calvin Klein. While performing "Bodyguard," the 35-time Grammy Award winner wore a sparkling black and gold underwear set designed by creative director Veronica Leoni, a milestone that marks the designer's first custom look for Calvin Klein Collection. Parkwood Entertainment Beyoncé in Calvin Klein The set featured the iconic logo bralette and high-waisted panty the the brand is known for, but contained more than a few dazzling embellishments to make it stage appropriate — the set was bedazzled with black and gold beads, which formed a subtle striped pattern and glittered with every camera flash and stage spotlight. The brand's signature Calvin Klein logo waistband was present on both the bralette and the high-waisted panty. Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. Courtesy of Calvin Klein Beyoncé in Calvin Klein Beyoncé teamed the look with a denim winged cape that contained feather detailing, also in black and gold. The brand confirmed in a press release that the item was "embroidered with over 28 thousand crystal beads and sequins" and "took 246 hours to complete - a testament to the meticulous craftsmanship and modern elegance Calvin Klein is known for." Parkwood Entertainment Beyoncé in Calvin Klein The pop star completed the glittering gold and black look with a pair of matching thigh-high boots. Beyoncé's Cowboy Carter Tour has featured several custom looks with laborious elements. Earlier in the tour, the singer enlisted Donatella Versace to create two custom looks — a hand-cut and hand-sewn white fringe and a crystal-covered bodysuit and a quilted ball gown covered in Versace's barocco print — for her June 6 and June 7 shows in Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London. The outfits took a total of 1,100 hours to create. Courtesy of Calvin Klein Beyoncé in Calvin Klein "When you design something for the catwalk, it is one thing, but then when you see Beyoncé bring a look to life and make it move so incredible on the stage, that gives me the greatest pleasure. She is a goddess, one of the nicest people on the planet and a true superstar. I can see the clothes giving her confidence and I can see how she uses them to enhance the performance," Donatella told PEOPLE exclusively following the shows. The PEOPLE App is now available in the Apple App Store! Download it now for the most binge-worthy celeb content, exclusive video clips, astrology updates and more! "When you see Beyoncé perform, you see every detail she has considered. She said on Saturday that she tried to make sure everyone felt as if they had a front row seat," she added. "When Versace holds a fashion show, we want people to feel the same too. I was truly humbled to have Beyoncé as my dear friend equally supporting me." Read the original article on People
